title: Windows PowerShell Web Request - B5C01B78
description: Detects the use of various web request methods (including aliases) via Windows PowerShell
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%Invoke-WebRequest%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%iwr %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%wget %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%curl %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%Net.WebClient%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%Start-BitsTransfer%" ESCAPE '\'))

SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4104" AND (ScriptBlockText LIKE "%Invoke-WebRequest%" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "%iwr %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "%wget %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "%curl %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "%Net.WebClient%" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "%Start-BitsTransfer%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: WMImplant Hack Tool - 1ADADA78
description: Detects parameters used by WMImplant
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (ScriptBlockText LIKE "%WMImplant%" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% change\_user %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% gen\_cli %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% command\_exec %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% disable\_wdigest %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% disable\_winrm %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% enable\_wdigest %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% enable\_winrm %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% registry\_mod %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% remote\_posh %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% sched\_job %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% service\_mod %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% process\_kill %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% active\_users %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% basic\_info %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% power\_off %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% vacant\_system %" ESCAPE '\' OR ScriptBlockText LIKE "% logon\_events %" ESCAPE '\')

title: Remote PowerShell Session - 56A62BF2
description: Detects remote PowerShell sessions
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("4103", "400") AND HostName = "ServerRemoteHost" AND HostApplication LIKE "%wsmprovhost.exe%" ESCAPE '\')

title: PowerShell Credential Prompt - 09D94C39
description: Detects PowerShell calling a credential prompt
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4104" AND (Message LIKE "%PromptForCredential%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: PowerShell Called from an Executable Version Mismatch - 6011C4B2
description: Detects PowerShell called from an executable by the version mismatch method
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "400" AND (EngineVersion LIKE "2.%" ESCAPE '\' OR EngineVersion LIKE "4.%" ESCAPE '\' OR EngineVersion LIKE "5.%" ESCAPE '\') AND HostVersion LIKE "3.%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Malicious PowerShell Keywords - 5EA1CF91
description: Detects keywords from well-known PowerShell exploitation frameworks
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Message LIKE "%AdjustTokenPrivileges%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%IMAGE\_NT\_OPTIONAL\_HDR64\_MAGIC%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Microsoft.Win32.UnsafeNativeMethods%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%ReadProcessMemory.Invoke%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%SE\_PRIVILEGE\_ENABLED%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%LSA\_UNICODE\_STRING%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%MiniDumpWriteDump%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%PAGE\_EXECUTE\_READ%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%SECURITY\_DELEGATION%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%TOKEN\_ADJUST\_PRIVILEGES%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%TOKEN\_ALL\_ACCESS%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%TOKEN\_ASSIGN\_PRIMARY%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%TOKEN\_DUPLICATE%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%TOKEN\_ELEVATION%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%TOKEN\_IMPERSONATE%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%TOKEN\_INFORMATION\_CLASS%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%TOKEN\_PRIVILEGES%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%TOKEN\_QUERY%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Metasploit%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Mimikatz%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Powershell Profile.ps1 Modification - 81CD7853
description: Detects a change in profile.ps1 of the Powershell profile
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "11" AND TargetFilename LIKE "%\\profile.ps1%" ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetFilename LIKE "%\\My Documents\\PowerShell\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE "%C:\\Windows\\System32\\WindowsPowerShell\\v1.0\\%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious XOR Encoded PowerShell Command Line - 6BF23067
description: Detects suspicious powershell process which includes bxor command, alternative obfuscation method to b64 encoded commands.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "400" AND HostName = "ConsoleHost" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%bxor%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%join%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%char%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Dnscat Execution - 19E7263A
description: Dnscat exfiltration tool execution
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4104" AND ScriptBlockText LIKE "%Start-Dnscat2%" ESCAPE '\')

title: PowerShell PSAttack - 4C858A11
description: Detects the use of PSAttack PowerShell hack tool
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4103" AND logs MATCH ('"PS ATTACK!!!"'))

title: Suspicious PowerShell Invocations - Specific - B42AAE92
description: Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation command parameters
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Message LIKE "% -nop -w hidden -c % [Convert]::FromBase64String%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "% -w hidden -noni -nop -c "iex(New-Object%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "% -w hidden -ep bypass -Enc%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%powershell.exe reg add HKCU\\software\\microsoft\\windows\\currentversion\\run%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%bypass -noprofile -windowstyle hidden (new-object system.net.webclient).download%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%iex(New-Object Net.WebClient).Download%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Data Compressed - Powershell - 3F9D62AF
description: An adversary may compress data (e.g., sensitive documents) that is collected prior to exfiltration in order to make it portable and minimize the amount of data sent over the network
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4104" AND keywords LIKE "%-Recurse%" ESCAPE '\' AND keywords LIKE "%|%" ESCAPE '\' AND keywords LIKE "%Compress-Archive%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Alternate PowerShell Hosts - 2E20CB01
description: Detects alternate PowerShell hosts potentially bypassing detections looking for powershell.exe
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID IN ("4103", "400") AND ContextInfo LIKE "%" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (ContextInfo = "powershell.exe" OR Message = "powershell.exe"))

title: PowerShell Create Local User - F467D626
description: Detects creation of a local user via PowerShell
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4104" AND (Message LIKE "%New-LocalUser%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Clear PowerShell History - 3E993CA7
description: Detects keywords that could indicate clearing PowerShell history
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (logs MATCH ('"del (Get-PSReadlineOption).HistorySavePath" OR "Set-PSReadlineOption –HistorySaveStyle SaveNothing" OR "Remove-Item (Get-PSReadlineOption).HistorySavePath" OR "rm (Get-PSReadlineOption).HistorySavePath"'))

title: CMSTP Execution Process Access - 07A99D5E
description: Detects various indicators of Microsoft Connection Manager Profile Installer execution
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "10" AND CallTrace LIKE "%cmlua.dll%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Malware Shellcode in Verclsid Target Process - 6CAD6C64
description: Detects a process access to verclsid.exe that injects shellcode from a Microsoft Office application / VBA macro
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "10" AND (TargetImage LIKE "%\\verclsid.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND GrantedAccess = "0x1FFFFF") AND (CallTrace LIKE "%|UNKNOWN(%VBE7.DLL%" ESCAPE '\' OR (SourceImage LIKE "%\\Microsoft Office\\%" ESCAPE '\' AND CallTrace LIKE "%|UNKNOWN%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Suspicious In-Memory Module Execution - 8B78C085
description: Detects the access to processes by other suspicious processes which have reflectively loaded libraries in their memory space. An example is SilentTrinity C2 behaviour. Generally speaking, when Sysmon EventID 10 cannot reference a stack call to a dll loaded from disk (the standard way), it will display "UNKNOWN" as the module name. Usually this means the stack call points to a module that was reflectively loaded in memory. Adding to this, it is not common to see such few calls in the stack (ntdll.dll --> kernelbase.dll --> unknown) which essentially means that most of the functions required by the process to execute certain routines are already present in memory, not requiring any calls to external libraries. The latter should also be considered suspicious.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "10" AND ((CallTrace LIKE "C:\\Windows\\SYSTEM32\\ntdll.dll+%|C:\\Windows\\System32\\KERNELBASE.dll+%|UNKNOWN(%)" ESCAPE '\' OR CallTrace LIKE "%UNKNOWN(%)|UNKNOWN(%)" ESCAPE '\') OR (EventID = "10" AND CallTrace LIKE "%UNKNOWN%" ESCAPE '\' AND GrantedAccess IN ("0x1F0FFF", "0x1F1FFF", "0x143A", "0x1410", "0x1010", "0x1F2FFF", "0x1F3FFF", "0x1FFFFF"))))

title: Credential Dumping by LaZagne - 0321DE46
description: Detects LSASS process access by LaZagne for credential dumping.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "10" AND TargetImage LIKE "%\\lsass.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CallTrace LIKE "C:\\Windows\\SYSTEM32\\ntdll.dll+%|C:\\Windows\\System32\\KERNELBASE.dll+%\_ctypes.pyd+%python27.dll+%" ESCAPE '\' AND GrantedAccess = "0x1FFFFF")

title: Suspect Svchost Memory Asccess - C8F899A1
description: Detects suspect access to svchost process memory such as that used by Invoke-Phantom to kill the winRM windows event logging service.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "10" AND TargetImage LIKE "%\\windows\\system32\\svchost.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND GrantedAccess = "0x1f3fff" AND (CallTrace LIKE "%unknown%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: LSASS Memory Dump - 3E605F84
description: Detects process LSASS memory dump using procdump or taskmgr based on the CallTrace pointing to dbghelp.dll or dbgcore.dll for win10
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "10" AND TargetImage LIKE "C:\\windows\\system32\\lsass.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND GrantedAccess = "0x1fffff" AND (CallTrace LIKE "%dbghelp.dll%" ESCAPE '\' OR CallTrace LIKE "%dbgcore.dll%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Credentials Dumping Tools Accessing LSASS Memory - 33F78E36
description: Detects process access LSASS memory which is typical for credentials dumping tools
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "10" AND (TargetImage LIKE "%\\lsass.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND (GrantedAccess LIKE "%0x40%" ESCAPE '\' OR GrantedAccess LIKE "%0x1000%" ESCAPE '\' OR GrantedAccess LIKE "%0x1400%" ESCAPE '\' OR GrantedAccess LIKE "%0x100000%" ESCAPE '\' OR GrantedAccess LIKE "%0x1410%" ESCAPE '\' OR GrantedAccess LIKE "%0x1010%" ESCAPE '\' OR GrantedAccess LIKE "%0x1438%" ESCAPE '\' OR GrantedAccess LIKE "%0x143a%" ESCAPE '\' OR GrantedAccess LIKE "%0x1418%" ESCAPE '\' OR GrantedAccess LIKE "%0x1f0fff%" ESCAPE '\' OR GrantedAccess LIKE "%0x1f1fff%" ESCAPE '\' OR GrantedAccess LIKE "%0x1f2fff%" ESCAPE '\' OR GrantedAccess LIKE "%0x1f3fff%" ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT ((ProcessName LIKE "%\\wmiprvse.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\taskmgr.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\procexp64.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\procexp.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\lsm.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\csrss.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\wininit.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\vmtoolsd.exe" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Mimikatz through Windows Remote Management - 8EAFF0AC
description: Detects usage of mimikatz through WinRM protocol by monitoring access to lsass process by wsmprovhost.exe.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "10" AND TargetImage LIKE "C:\\windows\\system32\\lsass.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND SourceImage LIKE "C:\\Windows\\system32\\wsmprovhost.exe" ESCAPE '\')

title: Active Directory Kerberos DLL Loaded Via Office Applications - 921E8367
description: Detects Kerberos DLL being loaded by an Office Product
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7" AND (Image LIKE "%\\winword.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\powerpnt.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\excel.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\outlook.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\kerberos.dll" ESCAPE '\'))

title: CLR DLL Loaded Via Office Applications - A0E1296F
description: Detects CLR DLL being loaded by an Office Product
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7" AND (Image LIKE "%\\winword.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\powerpnt.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\excel.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\outlook.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\clr.dll%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Abusing Azure Browser SSO - D410FF3D
description: Detects abusing Azure Browser SSO by requesting OAuth 2.0 refresh tokens for an Azure-AD-authenticated Windows user (i.e. the machine is joined to Azure AD and a user logs in with their Azure AD account) wanting to perform SSO authentication in the browser. An attacker can use this to authenticate to Azure AD in a browser as that user.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7" AND ImageLoaded LIKE "%MicrosoftAccountTokenProvider.dll" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%BackgroundTaskHost.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%devenv.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%iexplore.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%MicrosoftEdge.exe" ESCAPE '\')))

title: WMI Persistence - Command Line Event Consumer - 24B3E42E
description: Detects WMI command line event consumers
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7" AND Image LIKE "C:\\Windows\\System32\\wbem\\WmiPrvSE.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\wbemcons.dll" ESCAPE '\')

title: Active Directory Parsing DLL Loaded Via Office Applications - 7E5E4884
description: Detects DSParse DLL being loaded by an Office Product
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7" AND (Image LIKE "%\\winword.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\powerpnt.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\excel.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\outlook.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\dsparse.dll%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: dotNET DLL Loaded Via Office Applications - 1B12B7F1
description: Detects any assembly DLL being loaded by an Office Product
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7" AND (Image LIKE "%\\winword.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\powerpnt.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\excel.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\outlook.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (ImageLoaded LIKE "C:\\Windows\\assembly\\%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: In-memory PowerShell - 4FE9C2D3
description: Detects loading of essential DLL used by PowerShell, but not by the process powershell.exe. Detects meterpreter's "load powershell" extension.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7" AND (ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\System.Management.Automation.Dll" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\System.Management.Automation.ni.Dll" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%\\powershell.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\powershell\_ise.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\WINDOWS\\System32\\sdiagnhost.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\mscorsvw.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\WINDOWS\\System32\\RemoteFXvGPUDisablement.exe" ESCAPE '\')))

title: VBA DLL Loaded Via Microsoft Word - 66622F29
description: Detects DLL's Loaded Via Word Containing VBA Macros
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7" AND (Image LIKE "%\\winword.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\powerpnt.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\excel.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\outlook.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\VBE7.DLL" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\VBEUI.DLL" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\VBE7INTL.DLL" ESCAPE '\'))

title: GAC DLL Loaded Via Office Applications - 5D2E850A
description: Detects any GAC DLL being loaded by an Office Product
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7" AND (Image LIKE "%\\winword.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\powerpnt.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\excel.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\outlook.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (ImageLoaded LIKE "C:\\Windows\\Microsoft.NET\\assembly\\GAC\_MSIL%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Svchost DLL Search Order Hijack - 4F6A642E
description: IKEEXT and SessionEnv service, as they call LoadLibrary on files that do not exist within C:\Windows\System32\ by default. An attacker can place their malicious logic within the PROCESS_ATTACH block of their library and restart the aforementioned services "svchost.exe -k netsvcs" to gain code execution on a remote machine.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7" AND ((Image LIKE "%\\svchost.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\tsmsisrv.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\tsvipsrv.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\wlbsctrl.dll" ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT ((ImageLoaded LIKE "C:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: PowerShell Execution - 8D0D21A0
description: Detects execution of PowerShell
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7" AND Description = "system.management.automation" AND ImageLoaded LIKE "%system.management.automation%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Load of dbghelp/dbgcore DLL from Suspicious Process - F34D5700
description: Detects the load of dbghelp/dbgcore DLL (used to make memory dumps) by suspicious processes. Tools like ProcessHacker and some attacker tradecract use MiniDumpWriteDump API found in dbghelp.dll or dbgcore.dll. As an example, SilentTrynity C2 Framework has a module that leverages this API to dump the contents of Lsass.exe and transfer it over the network back to the attacker's machine.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7" AND ((((ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\dbghelp.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\dbgcore.dll" ESCAPE '\') AND (Image LIKE "%\\msbuild.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\cmd.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\svchost.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\powershell.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\word.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\excel.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\powerpnt.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\outlook.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\monitoringhost.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\wmic.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\bash.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\wscript.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\cscript.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\mshta.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\regsvr32.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\schtasks.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\dnx.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\regsvcs.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\sc.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\scriptrunner.exe" ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT (Image LIKE "%Visual Studio%" ESCAPE '\')) OR (((ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\dbghelp.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\dbgcore.dll" ESCAPE '\') AND Signed = "FALSE") AND NOT (Image LIKE "%Visual Studio%" ESCAPE '\'))))

title: Windows Management Instrumentation DLL Loaded Via Microsoft Word - 4FF90922
description: Detects DLL's Loaded Via Word Containing VBA Macros Executing WMI Commands
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7" AND (Image LIKE "%\\winword.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\powerpnt.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\excel.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\outlook.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\wmiutils.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\wbemcomn.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\wbemprox.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\wbemdisp.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\wbemsvc.dll" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Possible Process Hollowing Image Loading - 3BB88B96
description: Detects Loading of samlib.dll, WinSCard.dll from untypical process e.g. through process hollowing by Mimikatz
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7" AND (Image LIKE "%\\notepad.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\samlib.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\WinSCard.dll" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Unsigned Image Loaded Into LSASS Process - 08006BED
description: Loading unsigned image (DLL, EXE) into LSASS process
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7" AND Image LIKE "%\\lsass.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND Signed = "false")

title: Fax Service DLL Search Order Hijack - A5AA6D22
description: The Fax service attempts to load ualapi.dll, which is non-existent. An attacker can then (side)load their own malicious DLL using this service.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7" AND ((Image LIKE "%fxssvc.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (ImageLoaded LIKE "%ualapi.dll" ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT ((ImageLoaded LIKE "C:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: WMI Modules Loaded - 6CEECBEE
description: Detects non wmiprvse loading WMI modules
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7" AND (ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\wmiclnt.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\WmiApRpl.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\wmiprov.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\wmiutils.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\wbemcomn.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\wbemprox.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\WMINet\_Utils.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\wbemsvc.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\fastprox.dll" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%\\WmiPrvSe.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\WmiAPsrv.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\svchost.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\DeviceCensus.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\CompatTelRunner.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\sdiagnhost.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\SIHClient.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\ngentask.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\windows\\system32\\taskhostw.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\windows\\system32\\MoUsoCoreWorker.exe" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Sticky Key Like Backdoor Usage - F9BA9376
description: Detects the usage and installation of a backdoor that uses an option to register a malicious debugger for built-in tools that are accessible in the login screen
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Image File Execution Options\\sethc.exe\\Debugger" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Image File Execution Options\\utilman.exe\\Debugger" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Image File Execution Options\\osk.exe\\Debugger" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Image File Execution Options\\Magnify.exe\\Debugger" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Image File Execution Options\\Narrator.exe\\Debugger" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Image File Execution Options\\DisplaySwitch.exe\\Debugger" ESCAPE '\') AND EventType = "SetValue")

SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (ParentImage LIKE "%\\winlogon.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "%cmd.exe sethc.exe %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%cmd.exe utilman.exe %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%cmd.exe osk.exe %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%cmd.exe Magnify.exe %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%cmd.exe Narrator.exe %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%cmd.exe DisplaySwitch.exe %" ESCAPE '\'))

title: CMSTP Execution Registry Event - 31AC13A3
description: Detects various indicators of Microsoft Connection Manager Profile Installer execution
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND TargetObject LIKE "%\\cmmgr32.exe%" ESCAPE '\' AND EventType = "CreateKey")

title: Disable Security Events Logging Adding Reg Key MiniNt - DB7F575E
description: Detects the addition of a key 'MiniNt' to the registry. Upon a reboot, Windows Event Log service will stopped write events.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND ((TargetObject LIKE "HKLM\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\MiniNt" ESCAPE '\' AND EventType = "CreateKey") OR NewName LIKE "HKLM\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\MiniNt" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Leviathan Registry Key Activity - 8D249637
description: Detects registry key used by Leviathan APT in Malaysian focused campaign
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND TargetObject LIKE "HKEY\_CURRENT\_USER\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run\\ntkd" ESCAPE '\')

title: New DLL Added to AppInit_DLLs Registry Key - 6FDB34F0
description: DLLs that are specified in the AppInit_DLLs value in the Registry key HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Windows are loaded by user32.dll into every process that loads user32.dll
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND ((TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows\\AppInit\_Dlls" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\Wow6432Node\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows\\AppInit\_Dlls" ESCAPE '\') OR (NewName LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows\\AppInit\_Dlls" ESCAPE '\' OR NewName LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\Wow6432Node\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows\\AppInit\_Dlls" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Office Application Startup - Office Test - C2D4DD54
description: Detects the addition of office test registry that allows a user to specify an arbitrary DLL that will be executed everytime an Office application is started
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "HKEY\_CURRENT\_USER\\Software\\Microsoft\\Office test\\Special\\Perf" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "HKEY\_LOCAL\_MACHINE\\Software\\Microsoft\\Office test\\Special\\Perf" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Usage of Sysinternals Tools - 7D229208
description: Detects the usage of Sysinternals Tools due to accepteula key being added to Registry
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND TargetObject LIKE "%\\EulaAccepted" ESCAPE '\')
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND CommandLine LIKE "% -accepteula%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Registry Persistence Mechanisms - BB467BB2
description: Detects persistence registry keys
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Image File Execution Options\\%\\GlobalFlag" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\SilentProcessExit\\%\\ReportingMode" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\SilentProcessExit\\%\\MonitorProcess" ESCAPE '\') AND EventType = "SetValue")

title: Windows Registry Persistence COM Search Order Hijacking - 6D9CBBD4
description: Detects potential COM object hijacking leveraging the COM Search Order
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND TargetObject LIKE "HKU\\%\_Classes\\CLSID\\%\\InProcServer32\\(Default)" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((Details LIKE "\%\%systemroot\%\%\\system32\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "\%\%systemroot\%\%\\SysWow64\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\OneDrive\\%\\FileCoAuthLib64.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\OneDrive\\%\\FileSyncShell64.dll" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\TeamsMeetingAddin\\%\\Microsoft.Teams.AddinLoader.dll" ESCAPE '\')))

title: COM Hijack via Sdclt - 6AF68829
description: Detects changes to 'HKCU\Software\Classes\Folder\shell\open\command\DelegateExecute'
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "HKCU\\Software\\Classes\\Folder\\shell\\open\\command\\DelegateExecute" ESCAPE '\') AND (EventType LIKE "SetValue" ESCAPE '\'))

title: OceanLotus Registry Activity - 0D872E3B
description: Detects registry keys created in OceanLotus (also known as APT32) attacks
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "HKCR\\CLSID\\{E08A0F4B-1F65-4D4D-9A09-BD4625B9C5A1}\\Model" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "HKU\\%\_Classes\\CLSID\\{E08A0F4B-1F65-4D4D-9A09-BD4625B9C5A1}\\Model" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\App\\AppXbf13d4ea2945444d8b13e2121cb6b663\\Application" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\App\\AppXbf13d4ea2945444d8b13e2121cb6b663\\DefaultIcon" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\App\\AppX70162486c7554f7f80f481985d67586d\\Application" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\App\\AppX70162486c7554f7f80f481985d67586d\\DefaultIcon" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\App\\AppX37cc7fdccd644b4f85f4b22d5a3f105a\\Application" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\App\\AppX37cc7fdccd644b4f85f4b22d5a3f105a\\DefaultIcon" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "HKU\\%\_Classes\\AppXc52346ec40fb4061ad96be0e6cb7d16a\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "HKU\\%\_Classes\\AppX3bbba44c6cae4d9695755183472171e2\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "HKU\\%\_Classes\\CLSID\\{E3517E26-8E93-458D-A6DF-8030BC80528B}\\%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious New Printer Ports in Registry (CVE-2020-1048) - EC7C8A46
description: Detects a new and suspicious printer port creation in Registry that could be an attempt to exploit CVE-2020-1048
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND TargetObject LIKE "HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Ports%" ESCAPE '\' AND EventType IN ("SetValue", "DeleteValue", "CreateValue") AND (Details LIKE "%.dll%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%.bat%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%.com%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%C:%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Windows Credential Editor Registry - A4FDE84B
description: Detects the use of Windows Credential Editor (WCE)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND TargetObject LIKE "%Services\\WCESERVICE\\Start%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Pandemic Registry Key - 7E361B73
description: Detects Pandemic Windows Implant
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND TargetObject LIKE "%\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\services\\null\\Instance%" ESCAPE '\')
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND CommandLine LIKE "%loaddll -a %" ESCAPE '\')

title: SilentProcessExit Monitor Registrytion - F877E782
description: Detects changes to the Registry in which a monitor program gets registered to monitor the exit of another process
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND TargetObject LIKE "%Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\SilentProcessExit%" ESCAPE '\' AND Details LIKE "%MonitorProcess%" ESCAPE '\' AND EventType IN ("SetValue", "CreateValue"))

title: Suspicious Service Installed - 67EBE2FF
description: Detects installation of NalDrv or PROCEXP152 services via registry-keys to non-system32 folders. Both services are used in the tool Ghost-In-The-Logs (https://github.com/bats3c/Ghost-In-The-Logs), which uses KDU (https://github.com/hfiref0x/KDU)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND ((TargetObject LIKE "HKLM\\System\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\NalDrv\\ImagePath" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "HKLM\\System\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\PROCEXP152\\ImagePath" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%\\procexp64.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\procexp.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\procmon64.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\procmon.exe%" ESCAPE '\'))) AND NOT ((Details LIKE "%\\WINDOWS\\system32\\Drivers\\PROCEXP152.SYS%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: SilentProcessExit Monitor Registrytion for LSASS - B95472CF
description: Detects changes to the Registry in which a monitor program gets registered to dump process memory of the lsass.exe process memory
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND TargetObject LIKE "%Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\SilentProcessExit\\lsass.exe%" ESCAPE '\' AND EventType IN ("SetValue", "CreateValue"))

title: RedMimicry Winnti Playbook Registry Manipulation - B5127679
description: Detects actions caused by the RedMimicry Winnti playbook
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND TargetObject LIKE "%HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\HTMLHelp\\data%" ESCAPE '\')

title: WINEKEY Registry Modification - CB51AAB6
description: Detects potential malicious modification of run keys by winekey or team9 backdoor
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "%Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run\\Backup Mgr" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Narrator's Feedback-Hub Persistence - 507584C2
description: Detects abusing Windows 10 Narrator's Feedback-Hub
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND ((EventType = "DeleteValue" AND TargetObject LIKE "%\\AppXypsaf9f1qserqevf0sws76dx4k9a5206\\Shell\\open\\command\\DelegateExecute" ESCAPE '\') OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\AppXypsaf9f1qserqevf0sws76dx4k9a5206\\Shell\\open\\command\\(Default)" ESCAPE '\'))

title: DNS ServerLevelPluginDll Install - 34568C18
description: Detects the installation of a plugin DLL via ServerLevelPluginDll parameter in Registry, which can be used to execute code in context of the DNS server (restart required)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND TargetObject LIKE "%\\services\\DNS\\Parameters\\ServerLevelPluginDll" ESCAPE '\')
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND CommandLine LIKE "dnscmd.exe /config /serverlevelplugindll %" ESCAPE '\')

title: UAC Bypass via Sdclt - 83725ECA
description: Detects changes to HKCU:\Software\Classes\exefile\shell\runas\command\isolatedCommand
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND TargetObject LIKE "HKU\\%\_Classes\\exefile\\shell\\runas\\command\\isolatedCommand" ESCAPE '\')

title: Logon Scripts (UserInitMprLogonScript) Registry - F84F3B00
description: Detects creation or execution of UserInitMprLogonScript persistence method
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND TargetObject LIKE "%UserInitMprLogonScript%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Autorun Keys Modification - F2F929C8
description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\RunOnce%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\RunOnceEx%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\RunServices%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\RunServicesOnce%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Winlogon\\Userinit%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Winlogon\\Shell%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows\\AppInit\_DLLs%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\software\\Wow6432Node\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows\\AppInit\_DLLs%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows\\Load%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\software\\Wow6432Node\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows\\Load%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows\\Run%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\software\\Wow6432Node\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows\\Run%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Explorer\\User Shell Folders%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Windows Registry Persistence COM Key Linking - 7923DD80
description: Detects COM object hijacking via TreatAs subkey
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND EventType = "CreateKey" AND TargetObject LIKE "HKU\\%\_Classes\\CLSID\\%\\TreatAs" ESCAPE '\')

title: Registry Persistence via Explorer Run Key - A41F9016
description: Detects a possible persistence mechanism using RUN key for Windows Explorer and pointing to a suspicious folder
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND TargetObject LIKE "%\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Policies\\Explorer\\Run" ESCAPE '\' AND (Details LIKE "C:\\Windows\\Temp\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "C:\\ProgramData\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%\\AppData\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "C:\\$Recycle.bin\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "C:\\Temp\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "C:\\Users\\Public\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "C:\\Users\\Default\\%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious Keyboard Layout Load - D01A0425
description: Detects the keyboard preload installation with a suspicious keyboard layout, e.g. Chinese, Iranian or Vietnamese layout load in user session on systems maintained by US staff only
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "%\\Keyboard Layout\\Preload\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\Keyboard Layout\\Substitutes\\%" ESCAPE '\') AND (Details LIKE "%00000429%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%00050429%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%0000042a%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious RUN Key from Download - B4E961F1
description: Detects the suspicious RUN keys created by software located in Download or temporary Outlook/Internet Explorer directories
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (Image LIKE "%\\Downloads\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Temporary Internet Files\\Content.Outlook\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Local Settings\\Temporary Internet Files\\%" ESCAPE '\') AND TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run\\%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Stealthy VSTO Persistence - EEB32A52
description: Detects persistence via Visual Studio Tools for Office (VSTO) add-ins in Office applications.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "%\\Software\\Microsoft\\Office\\Outlook\\Addins\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\Software\\Microsoft\\Office\\Word\\Addins\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\Software\\Microsoft\\Office\\Excel\\Addins\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\Software\\Microsoft\\Office\\Powerpoint\\Addins\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\Software\\Microsoft\\VSTO\\Security\\Inclusion\\%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: DLL Load via LSASS - ACBD40D5
description: Detects a method to load DLL via LSASS process using an undocumented Registry key
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "%\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\NTDS\\DirectoryServiceExtPt%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\NTDS\\LsaDbExtPt%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: RDP Registry Modification - EE67ED90
description: Detects potential malicious modification of the property value of fDenyTSConnections and UserAuthentication to enable remote desktop connections.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "%\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Terminal Server\\WinStations\\RDP-Tcp\\UserAuthentication" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Terminal Server\\fDenyTSConnections" ESCAPE '\') AND Details = "DWORD (0x00000000)")

title: Suspicious Camera and Microphone Access - 0D950ED8
description: Detects Processes accessing the camera and microphone from suspicious folder
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "%\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\CapabilityAccessManager\\ConsentStore\\%\\NonPackaged%" ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetObject LIKE "%microphone%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%webcam%" ESCAPE '\') AND (TargetObject LIKE "%#C:#Windows#Temp#%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%#C:#$Recycle.bin#%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%#C:#Temp#%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%#C:#Users#Public#%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%#C:#Users#Default#%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%#C:#Users#Desktop#%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Windows Registry Trust Record Modification - 20FD3F65
description: Alerts on trust record modification within the registry, indicating usage of macros
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND TargetObject LIKE "%TrustRecords%" ESCAPE '\')

title: UAC Bypass via Event Viewer - 59939E18
description: Detects UAC bypass method using Windows event viewer
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND TargetObject LIKE "HKU\\%\\mscfile\\shell\\open\\command" ESCAPE '\')
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ParentImage LIKE "%\\eventvwr.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT (Image LIKE "%\\mmc.exe" ESCAPE '\'))

title: VBScript Payload Stored in Registry - 15BE2142
description: Detects VBScript content stored into registry keys as seen being used by UNC2452 group
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "%Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion%" ESCAPE '\' AND (Details LIKE "%vbscript%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%jscript%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%mshtml%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%mshtml,%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%mshtml %" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%RunHTMLApplication%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%Execute(%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%CreateObject%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%RegRead%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%window.close%" ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT (TargetObject LIKE "%Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: New DLL Added to AppCertDlls Registry Key - 634C2E53
description: Dynamic-link libraries (DLLs) that are specified in the AppCertDLLs value in the Registry key can be abused to obtain persistence and privilege escalation by causing a malicious DLL to be loaded and run in the context of separate processes on the computer.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "HKLM\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Session Manager\\AppCertDlls" ESCAPE '\' OR NewName LIKE "HKLM\\SYSTEM\\CurentControlSet\\Control\\Session Manager\\AppCertDlls" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Security Support Provider (SSP) Added to LSA Configuration - A478E88F
description: Detects the addition of a SSP to the registry. Upon a reboot or API call, SSP DLLs gain access to encrypted and plaintext passwords stored in Windows.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "HKLM\\System\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Lsa\\Security Packages" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "HKLM\\System\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Lsa\\OSConfig\\Security Packages" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (Image LIKE "C:\\Windows\\system32\\msiexec.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "C:\\Windows\\syswow64\\MsiExec.exe" ESCAPE '\'))

title: New RUN Key Pointing to Suspicious Folder - 15C124E4
description: Detects suspicious new RUN key element pointing to an executable in a suspicious folder
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\RunOnce\\%" ESCAPE '\') AND (Details LIKE "%C:\\Windows\\Temp\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%C:\\$Recycle.bin\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%C:\\Temp\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%C:\\Users\\Public\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "\%Public\%\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%C:\\Users\\Default\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "%C:\\Users\\Desktop\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "wscript%" ESCAPE '\' OR Details LIKE "cscript%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Possible Privilege Escalation via Service Permissions Weakness - 89C69195
description: Detect modification of services configuration (ImagePath, FailureCommand and ServiceDLL) in registry by processes with Medium integrity level
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND IntegrityLevel = "Medium" AND TargetObject LIKE "%\\services\\%" ESCAPE '\' AND (TargetObject LIKE "%\\ImagePath" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\FailureCommand" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\Parameters\\ServiceDll" ESCAPE '\'))

title: COMPlus_ETWEnabled Registry Modification - CB977F1D
description: Potential adversaries stopping ETW providers recording loaded .NET assemblies.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND TargetObject LIKE "%SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\.NETFramework\\ETWEnabled" ESCAPE '\' AND Details = "DWORD (0x00000000)")

title: Office Security Settings Changed - 929FD347
description: Detects registry changes to Office macro settings
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "%\\Security\\Trusted Documents\\TrustRecords" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\Security\\AccessVBOM" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\Security\\VBAWarnings" ESCAPE '\') AND EventType IN ("SetValue", "DeleteValue", "CreateValue"))

title: DHCP Callout DLL Installation - 9DB1A0E6
description: Detects the installation of a Callout DLL via CalloutDlls and CalloutEnabled parameter in Registry, which can be used to execute code in context of the DHCP server (restart required)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "%\\Services\\DHCPServer\\Parameters\\CalloutDlls" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\Services\\DHCPServer\\Parameters\\CalloutEnabled" ESCAPE '\'))

title: RDP Sensitive Settings Changed - 910E9290
description: Detects changes to RDP terminal service sensitive settings
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("12", "13", "14") AND (TargetObject LIKE "%\\services\\TermService\\Parameters\\ServiceDll%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\Control\\Terminal Server\\fSingleSessionPerUser%" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetObject LIKE "%\\Control\\Terminal Server\\fDenyTSConnections%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Interactive AT Job - 40AA8EE6
description: Detect an interactive AT job, which may be used as a form of privilege escalation
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\at.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%interactive%" ESCAPE '\')

title: WMI Persistence - Script Event Consumer - AEE69F79
description: Detects WMI script event consumers
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "C:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\wbem\\scrcons.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND ParentImage LIKE "C:\\Windows\\System32\\svchost.exe" ESCAPE '\')

title: WSF/JSE/JS/VBA/VBE File Execution - FC16BF60
description: Detects suspicious file execution by wscript and cscript
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Image LIKE "%\\wscript.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\cscript.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "%.jse%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%.vbe%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%.js%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%.vba%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Winnti Malware HK University Campaign - 76B96438
description: Detects specific process characteristics of Winnti malware noticed in Dec/Jan 2020 in a campaign against Honk Kong universities
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (((ParentImage LIKE "%C:\\Windows\\Temp%" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE "%\\hpqhvind.exe%" ESCAPE '\') AND Image LIKE "C:\\ProgramData\\DRM%" ESCAPE '\') OR (ParentImage LIKE "C:\\ProgramData\\DRM%" ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE "%\\wmplayer.exe" ESCAPE '\') OR (ParentImage LIKE "%\\Test.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE "%\\wmplayer.exe" ESCAPE '\') OR Image LIKE "C:\\ProgramData\\DRM\\CLR\\CLR.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR (ParentImage LIKE "C:\\ProgramData\\DRM\\Windows%" ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE "%\\SearchFilterHost.exe" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Ryuk Ransomware - F6CD37F0
description: Detects Ryuk ransomware activity
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND CommandLine LIKE "%Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%C:\\users\\Public\\%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Suspicious XOR Encoded PowerShell Command Line - DA1B4ED8
description: Detects suspicious powershell process which includes bxor command, alternative obfuscation method to b64 encoded commands.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Description = "Windows PowerShell" OR Product = "PowerShell Core 6") AND (CommandLine LIKE "%bxor%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%join%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%char%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious PowerShell Invocation Based on Parent Process - 40F97F1C
description: Detects suspicious powershell invocations from interpreters or unusual programs
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((ParentImage LIKE "%\\wscript.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE "%\\cscript.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (Image LIKE "%\\powershell.exe" ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT (CurrentDirectory LIKE "%\\Health Service State\\%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious Compression Tool Parameters - 748D3EA8
description: Detects suspicious command line arguments of common data compression tools
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((OriginalFileName LIKE "7z%.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFileName LIKE "%rar.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFileName LIKE "%Command%Line%RAR%" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "% -p%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -ta%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -tb%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -sdel%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -dw%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -hp%" ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT (ParentImage LIKE "C:\\Program%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious WMI Execution - 5C55F64D
description: Detects WMI executing suspicious commands
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Image LIKE "%\\wmic.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "%/NODE:%process call create %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% path AntiVirusProduct get %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% path FirewallProduct get %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% shadowcopy delete %" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious Service Path Modification - CD5058C7
description: Detects service path modification to powershell/cmd
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\sc.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%config%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%binpath%" ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE "%powershell%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%cmd%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Impacket Lateralization Detection - 00062FBD
description: Detects wmiexec/dcomexec/atexec/smbexec from Impacket framework
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (((ParentImage LIKE "%\\wmiprvse.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE "%\\mmc.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE "%\\explorer.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE "%\\services.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "%cmd.exe% /Q /c % \\\\127.0.0.1\\%&1%" ESCAPE '\')) OR ((ParentCommandLine LIKE "%svchost.exe -k netsvcs" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentCommandLine LIKE "taskeng.exe%" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "cmd.exe /C %Windows\\Temp\\%&1" ESCAPE '\'))))

title: Direct Autorun Keys Modification - 33F6818A
description: Detects direct modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry using reg.exe.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\reg.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%add%" ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\RunOnce%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\RunOnceEx%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\RunServices%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\RunServicesOnce%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Winlogon\\Userinit%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Winlogon\\Shell%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Explorer\\User Shell Folders%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\system\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\SafeBoot\\AlternateShell%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: TAIDOOR RAT DLL Load - 2DB01461
description: Detects specific process characteristics of Chinese TAIDOOR RAT malware load
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((CommandLine LIKE "%dll,MyStart%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%dll MyStart%" ESCAPE '\') OR (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "% MyStart" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "%rundll32.exe%" ESCAPE '\'))))

title: Taskmgr as LOCAL_SYSTEM - C3D8084B
description: Detects the creation of taskmgr.exe process in context of LOCAL_SYSTEM
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND User LIKE "NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM" ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE "%\\taskmgr.exe" ESCAPE '\')

title: Windows Kernel and 3rd-Party Drivers Exploits Token Stealing - D58ECBE9
description: Detection of child processes spawned with SYSTEM privileges by parents with non-SYSTEM privileges and Medium integrity level
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ParentIntegrityLevel = "Medium" AND IntegrityLevel = "System" AND User LIKE "NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM" ESCAPE '\')

title: Suspicious Rundll32 Activity Invoking Sys File - 17F9A090
description: Detects suspicious process related to rundll32 based on command line that includes a *.sys file as seen being used by UNC2452
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND CommandLine LIKE "%rundll32.exe%" ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE "%.sys,%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%.sys %" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Powershell AMSI Bypass via .NET Reflection - A9CB5420
description: Detects Request to amsiInitFailed that can be used to disable AMSI Scanning
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%System.Management.Automation.AmsiUtils%" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "%amsiInitFailed%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Windows Defender Download Activity - 146CBEEA
description: Detect the use of Windows Defender to download payloads
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%MpCmdRun.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR Description = "Microsoft Malware Protection Command Line Utility") AND (CommandLine LIKE "%DownloadFile%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%url%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Net.exe Execution - EFF0A82E
description: Detects execution of Net.exe, whether suspicious or benign.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Image LIKE "%\\net.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\net1.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "% group%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% localgroup%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% user%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% view%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% share" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% accounts%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% use%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% stop %" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Mimikatz Command Line - 265FBA63
description: Detection well-known mimikatz command line arguments
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((CommandLine LIKE "%DumpCreds%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%invoke-mimikatz%" ESCAPE '\') OR ((CommandLine LIKE "%rpc%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%token%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%crypto%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%dpapi%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%sekurlsa%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%kerberos%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%lsadump%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%privilege%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%process%" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "%::%" ESCAPE '\'))))

title: Webshell Recon Detection Via CommandLine & Processes - 4347395B
description: Looking for processes spawned by web server components that indicate reconnaissance by popular public domain webshells for whether perl, python or wget are installed.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (ParentImage LIKE "%\\apache%" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE "%\\tomcat%" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE "%\\w3wp.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE "%\\php-cgi.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE "%\\nginx.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE "%\\httpd.exe%" ESCAPE '\') AND (Image LIKE "%\\cmd.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "%perl --help%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%python --help%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%wget --help%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%perl -h%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Microsoft Workflow Compiler - 68991243
description: Detects invocation of Microsoft Workflow Compiler, which may permit the execution of arbitrary unsigned code.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\Microsoft.Workflow.Compiler.exe" ESCAPE '\')

title: PsExec Service Start - 1D0D655E
description: Detects a PsExec service start
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND CommandLine LIKE "C:\\Windows\\PSEXESVC.exe" ESCAPE '\')

title: Quick Execution of a Series of Suspicious Commands - 7C95702F
description: Detects multiple suspicious process in a limited timeframe
rule: SELECT * FROM (SELECT count(*) AS agg FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND CommandLine IN ("arp.exe", "at.exe", "attrib.exe", "cscript.exe", "dsquery.exe", "hostname.exe", "ipconfig.exe", "mimikatz.exe", "nbtstat.exe", "net.exe", "netsh.exe", "nslookup.exe", "ping.exe", "quser.exe", "qwinsta.exe", "reg.exe", "runas.exe", "sc.exe", "schtasks.exe", "ssh.exe", "systeminfo.exe", "taskkill.exe", "telnet.exe", "tracert.exe", "wscript.exe", "xcopy.exe", "pscp.exe", "copy.exe", "robocopy.exe", "certutil.exe", "vssadmin.exe", "powershell.exe", "wevtutil.exe", "psexec.exe", "bcedit.exe", "wbadmin.exe", "icacls.exe", "diskpart.exe")) GROUP BY MachineName) WHERE agg > 5

title: Suspicious GUP Usage - F409F806
description: Detects execution of the Notepad++ updater in a suspicious directory, which is often used in DLL side-loading attacks
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\GUP.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%:\\Users\\%\\AppData\\Local\\Notepad++\\updater\\GUP.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%:\\Users\\%\\AppData\\Roaming\\Notepad++\\updater\\GUP.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%:\\Program Files\\Notepad++\\updater\\GUP.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%:\\Program Files (x86)\\Notepad++\\updater\\GUP.exe" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Psr.exe Capture Screenshots - 33FB3789
description: The psr.exe captures desktop screenshots and saves them on the local machine
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\Psr.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%/start%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Fireball Archer Install - 88D4317E
description: Detects Archer malware invocation via rundll32
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND CommandLine LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe %,InstallArcherSvc" ESCAPE '\')

title: Windows Update Client LOLBIN - C84FA63B
description: Detects code execution via the Windows Update client (wuauclt)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (ProcessCommandline LIKE "%/UpdateDeploymentProvider%" ESCAPE '\' AND ProcessCommandline LIKE "%/RunHandlerComServer%" ESCAPE '\' AND (Image LIKE "%\\wuauclt.exe" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Rundll32 Without Parameters - F72787CD
description: Detects rundll32 execution without parameters as observed when running Metasploit windows/smb/psexec exploit module
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND CommandLine = "rundll32.exe")

title: Snatch Ransomware - 8094E6C7
description: Detects specific process characteristics of Snatch ransomware word document droppers
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%shutdown /r /f /t 00%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%net stop SuperBackupMan%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Windows Credential Editor - DC5BF7DB
description: Detects the use of Windows Credential Editor (WCE)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Imphash IN ("a53a02b997935fd8eedcb5f7abab9b9f", "e96a73c7bf33a464c510ede582318bf2") OR (CommandLine LIKE "%.exe -S" ESCAPE '\' AND ParentImage LIKE "%\\services.exe" ESCAPE '\')))

title: BlueMashroom DLL Load - 7A9DA51C
description: Detects a suspicious DLL loading from AppData Local path as described in BlueMashroom report
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%\\regsvr32%\\AppData\\Local\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\AppData\\Local\\%,DllEntry%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Possible Shim Database Persistence via sdbinst.exe - A09E4FBA
description: Detects installation of a new shim using sdbinst.exe. A shim can be used to load malicious DLLs into applications.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Image LIKE "%\\sdbinst.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "%.sdb%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: MMC Spawning Windows Shell - 3480A4C2
description: Detects a Windows command line executable started from MMC
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ParentImage LIKE "%\\mmc.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND (Image LIKE "%\\cmd.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\powershell.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\wscript.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\cscript.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\sh.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\bash.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\reg.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\regsvr32.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\BITSADMIN%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Netsh Port or Application Allowed - 38C167BB
description: Allow Incoming Connections by Port or Application on Windows Firewall
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%netsh%" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "%firewall add%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious AdFind Execution - 8AFBE2BF
description: Detects the execution of a AdFind for Active Directory enumeration
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (ProcessCommandLine LIKE "%objectcategory%" ESCAPE '\' AND (Image LIKE "%\\adfind.exe" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Shadow Copies Deletion Using Operating Systems Utilities - A21D9A3E
description: Shadow Copies deletion using operating systems utilities
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Image LIKE "%\\powershell.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\wmic.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\vssadmin.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND CommandLine LIKE "%shadow%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%delete%" ESCAPE '\')

title: DNS RCE CVE-2020-1350 - 733CC89A
description: Detects exploitation of DNS RCE bug reported in CVE-2020-1350 by the detection of suspicious sub process
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ParentImage LIKE "%\\System32\\dns.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%\\System32\\werfault.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\System32\\conhost.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\System32\\dnscmd.exe" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Sysmon Driver Unload - AFAC659F
description: Detect possible Sysmon driver unload
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\fltmc.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%unload%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%sys%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Bypass UAC via Fodhelper.exe - 8FC659E3
description: Identifies use of Fodhelper.exe to bypass User Account Control. Adversaries use this technique to execute privileged processes.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ParentImage LIKE "%\\fodhelper.exe" ESCAPE '\')

title: WMIExec VBS Script - 1FB3DA4A
description: Detects suspicious file execution by wscript and cscript
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\cscript.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%.vbs /shell %" ESCAPE '\')

title: Mouse Lock Credential Gathering - 7A915B11
description: In Kaspersky's 2020 Incident Response Analyst Report they listed legitimate tool "Mouse Lock" as being used for both credential access and collection in security incidents.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Product LIKE "%Mouse Lock%" ESCAPE '\' OR Company LIKE "%Misc314%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%Mouse Lock\_%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Tap Installer Execution - 98EF260A
description: Well-known TAP software installation. Possible preparation for data exfiltration using tunneling techniques
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\tapinstall.exe" ESCAPE '\')

title: Koadic Execution - 0F9F5D47
description: Detects command line parameters used by Koadic hack tool
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%cmd.exe% /q /c chcp %" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious Debugger Registration Cmdline - D20AF6B7
description: Detects the registration of a debugger for a program that is available in the logon screen (sticky key backdoor).
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%\\CurrentVersion\\Image File Execution Options\\sethc.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\CurrentVersion\\Image File Execution Options\\utilman.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\CurrentVersion\\Image File Execution Options\\osk.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\CurrentVersion\\Image File Execution Options\\magnify.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\CurrentVersion\\Image File Execution Options\\narrator.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\CurrentVersion\\Image File Execution Options\\displayswitch.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\CurrentVersion\\Image File Execution Options\\atbroker.exe%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Renamed PsExec - 4C6813B9
description: Detects the execution of a renamed PsExec often used by attackers or malware
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Description = "Execute processes remotely" AND Product = "Sysinternals PsExec") AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%\\PsExec.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\PsExec64.exe" ESCAPE '\')))

title: SecurityXploded Tool - 6728B299
description: Detects the execution of SecurityXploded Tools
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Company = "SecurityXploded" OR Image LIKE "%PasswordDump.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFilename LIKE "%PasswordDump.exe" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious Encoded PowerShell Command Line - 93B423D0
description: Detects suspicious powershell process starts with base64 encoded commands (e.g. Emotet)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "% -e JAB%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -e  JAB%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -e   JAB%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -e    JAB%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -e     JAB%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -e      JAB%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -en JAB%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -enc JAB%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -enc% JAB%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -w hidden -e% JAB%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% BA^J e-" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -e SUVYI%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -e aWV4I%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -e SQBFAFgA%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -e aQBlAHgA%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -enc SUVYI%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -enc aWV4I%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -enc SQBFAFgA%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -enc aQBlAHgA%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -e% IAA%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -e% IAB%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -e% UwB%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -e% cwB%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%.exe -ENCOD %" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (CommandLine LIKE "% -ExecutionPolicy remotesigned %" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Tasks Folder Evasion - A8B561B1
description: The Tasks folder in system32 and syswow64 are globally writable paths. Adversaries can take advantage of this and load or influence any script hosts or ANY .NET Application in Tasks to load and execute a custom assembly into cscript, wscript, regsvr32, mshta, eventvwr
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((CommandLine LIKE "%echo %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%copy %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%type %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%file createnew%" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "% C:\\Windows\\System32\\Tasks\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% C:\\Windows\\SysWow64\\Tasks\\%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Execution in Outlook Temp Folder - D2A03827
description: Detects a suspicious program execution in Outlook temp folder
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\Temporary Internet Files\\Content.Outlook\\%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Malicious Base64 Encoded PowerShell Keywords in Command Lines - 837D3FBD
description: Detects base64 encoded strings used in hidden malicious PowerShell command lines
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\powershell.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "% hidden %" ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE "%AGkAdABzAGEAZABtAGkAbgAgAC8AdAByAGEAbgBzAGYAZQByA%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%aXRzYWRtaW4gL3RyYW5zZmVy%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%IAaQB0AHMAYQBkAG0AaQBuACAALwB0AHIAYQBuAHMAZgBlAHIA%" title: WannaCry Ransomware - CAD74088
description: Detects WannaCry ransomware activity
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((Image LIKE "%\\tasksche.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\mssecsvc.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\taskdl.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\@WanaDecryptor@%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\WanaDecryptor%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\taskhsvc.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\taskse.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\111.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\lhdfrgui.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\diskpart.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\linuxnew.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\wannacry.exe" ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE "%icacls % /grant Everyone:F /T /C /Q%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%bcdedit /set {default} recoveryenabled no%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%wbadmin delete catalog -quiet%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%@Please\_Read\_Me@.txt%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: PowerShell Download from URL - B42CF391
description: Detects a Powershell process that contains download commands in its command line string
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\powershell.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE "%new-object system.net.webclient).downloadstring(%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%new-object system.net.webclient).downloadfile(%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%new-object net.webclient).downloadstring(%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%new-object net.webclient).downloadfile(%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Lazarus Session Highjacker - EB6CF5A5
description: Detects executables launched outside their default directories as used by Lazarus Group (Bluenoroff)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Image LIKE "%\\msdtc.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\gpvc.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT ((Image LIKE "C:\\Windows\\System32\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Application Whitelisting Bypass via Dxcap.exe - 66B56A06
description: Detects execution of of Dxcap.exe
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\dxcap.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%-c%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%.exe%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Winnti Pipemon Characteristics - B8DD50C0
description: Detects specific process characteristics of Winnti Pipemon malware reported by ESET
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((CommandLine LIKE "%setup0.exe -p%" ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE "%setup.exe -x:0" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%setup.exe -x:1" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%setup.exe -x:2" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Suspicious Use of CSharp Interactive Console - EE5E074B
description: Detects the execution of CSharp interactive console by PowerShell
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\csi.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND ParentImage LIKE "%\\powershell.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND OriginalFileName = "csi.exe")

title: OpenWith.exe Executes Specified Binary - 0608BC89
description: The OpenWith.exe executes other binary
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\OpenWith.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%/c%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Grabbing Sensitive Hives via Reg Utility - 9DAA6E50
description: Dump sam, system or security hives using REG.exe utility
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\reg.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE "%save%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%export%" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "%hklm%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%hkey\_local\_machine%" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "%\\system" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\sam" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\security" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Possible SPN Enumeration - 664861A5
description: Detects Service Principal Name Enumeration used for Kerberoasting
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Image LIKE "%\\setspn.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Description LIKE "%Query or reset the computer% SPN attribute%" ESCAPE '\') AND CommandLine LIKE "%-q%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Windows Network Enumeration - 274368BB
description: Identifies attempts to enumerate hosts in a network using the built-in Windows net.exe tool.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((Image LIKE "%\\net.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\net1.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND CommandLine LIKE "%view%" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (CommandLine LIKE "%\\%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious Auditpol Usage - A5DF29E4
description: Threat actors can use auditpol binary to change audit policy configuration to impair detection capability. This can be carried out by selectively disabling/removing certain audit policies as well as restoring a custom policy owned by the threat actor.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\auditpol.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE "%disable%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%clear%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%remove%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%restore%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Modification of Boot Configuration - E573AD10
description: Identifies use of the bcdedit command to delete boot configuration data. This tactic is sometimes used as by malware or an attacker as a destructive technique.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Image LIKE "%\\bcdedit.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%set%" ESCAPE '\') AND ((CommandLine LIKE "%bootstatuspolicy%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%ignoreallfailures%" ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE "%recoveryenabled%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%no%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Bloodhound and Sharphound Hack Tool - 81B19018
description: Detects command line parameters used by Bloodhound and Sharphound hack tools
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((Image LIKE "%\\Bloodhound.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\SharpHound.exe%" ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE "% -CollectionMethod All %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%.exe -c All -d %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%Invoke-Bloodhound%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%Get-BloodHoundData%" ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE "% -JsonFolder %" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "% -ZipFileName %" ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE "% DCOnly %" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "% --NoSaveCache %" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Suspicious Curl File Upload - CC505210
description: Detects a suspicious curl process start the adds a file to a web request
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\curl.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "% -F %" ESCAPE '\')

title: DTRACK Process Creation - EA59543E
description: Detects specific process parameters as seen in DTRACK infections
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND CommandLine LIKE "% echo EEEE > %" ESCAPE '\')

title: TA505 Dropper Load Pattern - E7A796F9
description: Detects mshta loaded by wmiprvse as parent as used by TA505 malicious documents
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\mshta.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND ParentImage LIKE "%\\wmiprvse.exe" ESCAPE '\')

title: Logon Scripts (UserInitMprLogonScript) - A7538B1C
description: Detects creation or execution of UserInitMprLogonScript persistence method
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((EventID = "1" AND (ParentImage LIKE "%\\userinit.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT (Image LIKE "%\\explorer.exe" ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT ((CommandLine LIKE "%netlogon.bat%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%UsrLogon.cmd%" ESCAPE '\'))) OR CommandLine LIKE "%UserInitMprLogonScript%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Java Running with Remote Debugging - 8896A463
description: Detects a JAVA process running with remote debugging allowing more than just localhost to connect
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND CommandLine LIKE "%transport=dt\_socket,address=%" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT (CommandLine LIKE "%address=127.0.0.1%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%address=localhost%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Disable Windows Eventlog - 7A63005B
description: Detects command that is used to disable Windows eventlog
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND CommandLine LIKE "%logman stop EventLog-System%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Emotet RunDLL32 Process Creation - A1BD64B2
description: Detecting Emotet DLL loading by looking for rundll32.exe processes with command lines ending in ,RunDLL or ,#1
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((Image LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "%,RunDLL" ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT ((ParentImage LIKE "%\\tracker.exe" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Dridex Process Pattern - 63B1DC25
description: Detects typical Dridex process patterns
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%\\svchost.exe C:\\Users\\%\\Desktop\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR (ParentImage LIKE "%\\svchost.exe%" ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE "%whoami.exe /all" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%net.exe view" ESCAPE '\'))))

title: Hiding Files with Attrib.exe - A26D2509
description: Detects usage of attrib.exe to hide files from users.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Image LIKE "%\\attrib.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "% +h %" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT ((EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%\\desktop.ini %" ESCAPE '\' OR (ParentImage LIKE "%\\cmd.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "+R +H +S +A \\%.cui" ESCAPE '\' AND ParentCommandLine LIKE "C:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\%.bat" ESCAPE '\')))))

title: Possible Applocker Bypass - 52DCB826
description: Detects execution of executables that can be used to bypass Applocker whitelisting
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%\\msdt.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\installutil.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\regsvcs.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\regasm.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\msbuild.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\ieexec.exe%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious Service Binary Directory - 898CED8D
description: Detects a service binary running in a suspicious directory
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Image LIKE "%\\Users\\Public\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\$Recycle.bin%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Users\\All Users\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Users\\Default\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Users\\Contacts\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Users\\Searches\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%C:\\Perflogs\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\config\\systemprofile\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Windows\\Fonts\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Windows\\IME\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Windows\\addins\\%" ESCAPE '\') AND (ParentImage LIKE "%\\services.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE "%\\svchost.exe" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Audio Capture via PowerShell - 9C7AC3C0
description: Detects audio capture via PowerShell Cmdlet
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND CommandLine LIKE "%WindowsAudioDevice-Powershell-Cmdlet%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Run Whoami as SYSTEM - 9D9C3B4D
description: Detects a whoami.exe executed by LOCAL SYSTEM. This may be a sign of a successful local privilege escalation.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND User LIKE "NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM" ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE "%\\whoami.exe" ESCAPE '\')

title: Trickbot Malware Activity - 740CD6C7
description: Detects Trickbot malware process tree pattern in which rundll32.exe is parent of wermgr.exe
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Image LIKE "%\\wermgr.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (ParentImage LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (ParentCommandLine LIKE "%DllRegisterServer%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Renamed Binary - 3FF0CCCC
description: Detects the execution of a renamed binary often used by attackers or malware leveraging new Sysmon OriginalFileName datapoint.
