rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%SUVYIChb%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%lFWCAoW%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%JRVggKF%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%aWV4IChb%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%lleCAoW%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%pZXggKF%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%aWV4IChOZX%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%lleCAoTmV3%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%pZXggKE5ld%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%SUVYIChOZX%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%lFWCAoTmV3%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%JRVggKE5ld%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: GALLIUM Artefacts - DD81361A
description: Detects artefacts associated with activity group GALLIUM - Microsoft Threat Intelligence Center indicators released in December 2019.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "257" AND QNAME IN ("asyspy256.ddns.net", "hotkillmail9sddcc.ddns.net", "rosaf112.ddns.net", "cvdfhjh1231.myftp.biz", "sz2016rose.ddns.net", "dffwescwer4325.myftp.biz", "cvdfhjh1231.ddns.net"))

SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (sha1 LIKE "e570585edc69f9074cb5e8a790708336bd45ca0f" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%:\\Program Files(x86)\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%:\\Program Files\\%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Suspicious Commandline Escape - FBC911BF
description: Detects suspicious process that use escape characters
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%h^t^t^p%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%h"t"t"p%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Lazarus Activity - F1BA5D3B
description: Detects different process creation events as described in various threat reports on Lazarus group activity
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((CommandLine LIKE "%reg.exe save hklm\\sam \%temp\%\\~reg\_sam.save%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%1q2w3e4r@#$@#$@#$%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -hp1q2w3e4 %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%.dat data03 10000 -p %" ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE "%process call create%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "% > \%temp\%\\~%" ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE "%netstat -aon | find %" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "% > \%temp\%\\~%" ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE "%.255 10 C:\\ProgramData\\\*" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Ke3chang Registry Key Modifications - 4ADF4202
description: Detects Registry modifications performed by Ke3chang malware in campaigns running in 2019 and 2020
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%-Property DWORD -name DisableFirstRunCustomize -value 2 -Force%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%-Property String -name Check\_Associations -value%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%-Property DWORD -name IEHarden -value 0 -Force%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: SquiblyTwo - C7BA737B
description: Detects WMI SquiblyTwo Attack with possible renamed WMI by looking for imphash
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (((Image LIKE "%\\wmic.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "wmic % %format:\\"http%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "wmic % /format:'http" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "wmic % /format:http%" ESCAPE '\')) OR (Imphash IN ("1B1A3F43BF37B5BFE60751F2EE2F326E", "37777A96245A3C74EB217308F3546F4C", "9D87C9D67CE724033C0B40CC4CA1B206") AND (CommandLine LIKE "% %format:\\"http%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% /format:'http" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% /format:http%" ESCAPE '\'))))

title: Equation Group DLL_U Load - 1C45FB2C
description: Detects a specific tool and export used by EquationGroup
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((Image LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%,dll\_u" ESCAPE '\') OR CommandLine LIKE "% -export dll\_u %" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Exploit for CVE-2017-0261 - C2E8CB77
description: Detects Winword starting uncommon sub process FLTLDR.exe as used in exploits for CVE-2017-0261 and CVE-2017-0262
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ParentImage LIKE "%\\WINWORD.EXE" ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE "%\\FLTLDR.exe%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Suspicious Reconnaissance Activity - 8C122613
description: Detects suspicious command line activity on Windows systems
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND CommandLine IN ("net group "domain admins" /domain", "net localgroup administrators", "net group "enterprise admins" /domain"))

title: WMI Backdoor Exchange Transport Agent - AF33D17F
description: Detects a WMi backdoor in Exchange Transport Agents via WMi event filters
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ParentImage LIKE "%\\EdgeTransport.exe" ESCAPE '\')

title: Advanced IP Scanner - 59E78298
description: Detects the use of Advanced IP Scanner. Seems to be a popular tool for ransomware groups.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\advanced\_ip\_scanner%" ESCAPE '\')

title: ShimCache Flush - 66BFB4DF
description: Detects actions that clear the local ShimCache and remove forensic evidence
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND CommandLine LIKE "%rundll32%" ESCAPE '\' AND ((CommandLine LIKE "%apphelp.dll%" ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE "%ShimFlushCache%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%#250%" ESCAPE '\')) OR (CommandLine LIKE "%kernel32.dll%" ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE "%BaseFlushAppcompatCache%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%#46%" ESCAPE '\'))))

title: Possible Ransomware or Unauthorized MBR Modifications - 3FA2C705
description: Detects, possibly, malicious unauthorized usage of bcdedit.exe
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\bcdedit.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE "%delete%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%deletevalue%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%import%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Detection of Possible Rotten Potato - 237E2178
description: Detection of child processes spawned with SYSTEM privileges by parents with LOCAL SERVICE or NETWORK SERVICE privileges
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((ParentUser LIKE "NT AUTHORITY\\NETWORK SERVICE" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentUser LIKE "NT AUTHORITY\\LOCAL SERVICE" ESCAPE '\') AND User LIKE "NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (Image LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%DavSetCookie%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Judgement Panda Exfil Activity - 6EF8ADD5
description: Detects Judgement Panda activity as described in Global Threat Report 2019 by Crowdstrike
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((CommandLine LIKE "%\\ldifde.exe -f -n %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\7za.exe a 1.7z %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% eprod.ldf" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\aaaa\\procdump64.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\aaaa\\netsess.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\aaaa\\7za.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%copy .\\1.7z \\%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%copy \\client\\c$\\aaaa\\%" ESCAPE '\') OR Image LIKE "C:\\Users\\Public\\7za.exe" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Ping Hex IP - 09A0E9D7
description: Detects a ping command that uses a hex encoded IP address
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%\\ping.exe 0x%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\ping 0x%" ESCAPE '\') AND (Image LIKE "%ping.exe%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Meterpreter or Cobalt Strike Getsystem Service Start - 2892E691
description: Detects the use of getsystem Meterpreter/Cobalt Strike command by detecting a specific service starting
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (ParentImage LIKE "%\\services.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND ((CommandLine LIKE "%cmd%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%/c%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%echo%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%\\pipe\\%" ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE "%\%COMSPEC\%%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%/c%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%echo%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%\\pipe\\%" ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE "%rundll32%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%.dll,a%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%/p:%" ESCAPE '\'))) AND NOT (CommandLine LIKE "%MpCmdRun%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Harvesting of Wifi Credentials Using netsh.exe - 5E544708
description: Detect the harvesting of wifi credentials using netsh.exe
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "netsh wlan s% p% k%=clear" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Taskmgr as Parent - 31287350
description: Detects the creation of a process from Windows task manager
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ParentImage LIKE "%\\taskmgr.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%\\resmon.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\mmc.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\taskmgr.exe" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Turla Group Commands May 2020 - 042F33B6
description: Detects commands used by Turla group as reported by ESET in May 2020
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((CommandLine LIKE "%tracert -h 10 yahoo.com%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%.WSqmCons))|iex;%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%Fr`omBa`se6`4Str`ing%" ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE "%net use https://docs.live.net%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%@aol.co.uk%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Windows Shell Spawning Suspicious Program - 9CBDF3CB
description: Detects a suspicious child process of a Windows shell
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((ParentImage LIKE "%\\mshta.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE "%\\powershell.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE "%\\cscript.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE "%\\wscript.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE "%\\wmiprvse.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (Image LIKE "%\\schtasks.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\nslookup.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\certutil.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\bitsadmin.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\mshta.exe" ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT (CurrentDirectory LIKE "%\\ccmcache\\%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Capture a Network Trace with netsh.exe - 71A85F31
description: Detects capture a network trace via netsh.exe trace functionality
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND CommandLine LIKE "%netsh%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%trace%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%start%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Operation Wocao Activity - B6C1A756
description: Detects activity mentioned in Operation Wocao report
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4799" AND GroupName = "Administrators" AND ProcessName LIKE "%\\checkadmin.exe" ESCAPE '\')

SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%checkadmin.exe 127.0.0.1 -all%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name=powershell dir=in%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%cmd /c powershell.exe -ep bypass -file c:\\s.ps1%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%/tn win32times /f%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%create win32times binPath=%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\c$\\windows\\system32\\devmgr.dll%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% -exec bypass -enc JgAg%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%type %keepass\\KeePass.config.xml%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%iie.exe iie.txt%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%reg query HKEY\_CURRENT\_USER\\Software\\%\\PuTTY\\Sessions\\%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: RedMimicry Winnti Playbook Execute - 55E3C16D
description: Detects actions caused by the RedMimicry Winnti playbook
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Image LIKE "%rundll32.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%cmd.exe%" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "%gthread-3.6.dll%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\Windows\\Temp\\tmp.bat%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%sigcmm-2.4.dll%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Executable Used by PlugX in Uncommon Location - F27BE9A4
description: Detects the execution of an executable that is typically used by PlugX for DLL side loading started from an uncommon location
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((((((((((((Image LIKE "%\\CamMute.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT (Image LIKE "%\\Lenovo\\Communication Utility\\%" ESCAPE '\')) OR (Image LIKE "%\\chrome\_frame\_helper.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT (Image LIKE "%\\Google\\Chrome\\application\\%" ESCAPE '\'))) OR (Image LIKE "%\\dvcemumanager.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT (Image LIKE "%\\Microsoft Device Emulator\\%" ESCAPE '\'))) OR (Image LIKE "%\\Gadget.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT (Image LIKE "%\\Windows Media Player\\%" ESCAPE '\'))) OR (Image LIKE "%\\hcc.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT (Image LIKE "%\\HTML Help Workshop\\%" ESCAPE '\'))) OR (Image LIKE "%\\hkcmd.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%\\System32\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\SysNative\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\SysWowo64\\%" ESCAPE '\')))) OR (Image LIKE "%\\Mc.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%\\Microsoft Visual Studio%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Microsoft SDK%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Windows Kit%" ESCAPE '\')))) OR (Image LIKE "%\\MsMpEng.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%\\Microsoft Security Client\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Windows Defender\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\AntiMalware\\%" ESCAPE '\')))) OR (Image LIKE "%\\msseces.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%\\Microsoft Security Center\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Microsoft Security Client\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Microsoft Security Essentials\\%" ESCAPE '\')))) OR (Image LIKE "%\\OInfoP11.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT (Image LIKE "%\\Common Files\\Microsoft Shared\\%" ESCAPE '\'))) OR (Image LIKE "%\\OleView.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%\\Microsoft Visual Studio%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Microsoft SDK%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Windows Kit%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Windows Resource Kit\\%" ESCAPE '\')))) OR (Image LIKE "%\\rc.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%\\Microsoft Visual Studio%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Microsoft SDK%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Windows Kit%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Windows Resource Kit\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\Microsoft.NET\\%" ESCAPE '\')))))

title: MSHTA Spawning Windows Shell - D7F2B1CB
description: Detects a Windows command line executable started from MSHTA
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ParentImage LIKE "%\\mshta.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND (Image LIKE "%\\cmd.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\powershell.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\wscript.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\cscript.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\sh.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\bash.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\reg.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\regsvr32.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\BITSADMIN%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Renamed PowerShell - E905CB3C
description: Detects the execution of a renamed PowerShell often used by attackers or malware
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Description = "Windows PowerShell" AND Company = "Microsoft Corporation") AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%\\powershell.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\powershell\_ise.exe" ESCAPE '\')))

title: MSHTA Spwaned by SVCHOST - C1DCD10A
description: Detects MSHTA.EXE spwaned by SVCHOST as seen in LethalHTA and described in report
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ParentImage LIKE "%\\svchost.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE "%\\mshta.exe" ESCAPE '\')

title: ScreenConnect Remote Access - FF6EECAD
description: Detects ScreenConnect program starts that establish a remote access to that system (not meeting, not remote support)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND CommandLine LIKE "%e=Access&%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%y=Guest&%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%&p=%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%&c=%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%&k=%" ESCAPE '\')

title: CreateMiniDump Hacktool - 8F2CBBB0
description: Detects the use of CreateMiniDump hack tool used to dump the LSASS process memory for credential extraction on the attacker's machine
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Image LIKE "%\\CreateMiniDump.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR Imphash = "4a07f944a83e8a7c2525efa35dd30e2f"))
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "11" AND TargetFilename LIKE "%\\lsass.dmp%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Command Line Execution with Suspicious URL and AppData Strings - DF082C94
description: Detects a suspicious command line execution that includes an URL and AppData string in the command line parameters as used by several droppers (js/vbs > powershell)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "cmd.exe /c %http://%\%AppData\%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "cmd.exe /c %https://%\%AppData\%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Adwind RAT / JRAT - 9AE2C567
description: Detects javaw.exe in AppData folder as used by Adwind / JRAT
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%\\AppData\\Roaming\\Oracle%\\java%.exe %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%cscript.exe %Retrive%.vbs %" ESCAPE '\'))
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "11" AND (TargetFilename LIKE "%\\AppData\\Roaming\\Oracle\\bin\\java%.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetFilename LIKE "%\\Retrive%.vbs" ESCAPE '\'))

SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "13" AND TargetObject LIKE "HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run%" ESCAPE '\' AND Details LIKE "\%AppData\%\\Roaming\\Oracle\\bin\\%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Maze Ransomware - 8D619080
description: Detects specific process characteristics of Maze ransomware word document droppers
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (((ParentImage LIKE "%\\WINWORD.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (Image LIKE "%.tmp" ESCAPE '\')) OR (Image LIKE "%\\wmic.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND ParentImage LIKE "%\\Temp\\%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%shadowcopy delete" ESCAPE '\') OR (CommandLine LIKE "%shadowcopy delete" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%\\..\\..\\system32%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: File or Folder Permissions Modifications - BB669425
description: Detects a file or folder permissions modifications
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (((Image LIKE "%\\takeown.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\cacls.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\icacls.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND CommandLine LIKE "%/grant%" ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE "%\\attrib.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%-r%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Suspicious RDP Redirect Using TSCON - 9FDEE0C7
description: Detects a suspicious RDP session redirect using tscon.exe
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND CommandLine LIKE "% /dest:rdp-tcp:%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Domain Trust Discovery - A07CFC47
description: Detects a discovery of domain trusts
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((Image LIKE "%\\dsquery.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%-filter%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%trustedDomain%" ESCAPE '\') OR (Image LIKE "%\\nltest.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%domain\_trusts%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Suspicious VBScript UN2452 Pattern - 21AB7CFA
description: Detects suspicious inline VBScript keywords as used by UNC2452
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%Execute%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%CreateObject%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%RegRead%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%window.close%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion%" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT ((CommandLine LIKE "%\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Suspicious Desktopimgdownldr Command - EE0ACBBC
description: Detects a suspicious Microsoft desktopimgdownldr execution with parameters used to download files from the Internet
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((EventID = "1" AND CommandLine LIKE "% /lockscreenurl:%" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((CommandLine LIKE "%.jpg%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%.jpeg%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%.png%" ESCAPE '\'))) OR (CommandLine LIKE "%reg delete%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%\\PersonalizationCSP%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: ZxShell Malware - 950DCE55
description: Detects a ZxShell start by the called and well-known function name
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%rundll32.exe %,zxFunction%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%rundll32.exe %,RemoteDiskXXXXX%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious MsiExec Directory - DB96ED6E
description: Detects suspicious msiexec process starts in an uncommon directory
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\msiexec.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND NOT ((Image LIKE "C:\\Windows\\System32\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "C:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Psexec Accepteula Condition - ED6A17C0
description: Detect ed user accept agreement execution in psexec commandline
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\psexec.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%accepteula%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Suspicious File Characteristics Due to Missing Fields - E740A13F
description: Detects Executables in the Downloads folder without FileVersion,Description,Product,Company likely created with py2exe
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Description LIKE "\?" ESCAPE '\' AND (FileVersion LIKE "\?" ESCAPE '\' OR Product LIKE "\?" ESCAPE '\' OR Company LIKE "\?" ESCAPE '\') AND Image LIKE "%\\Downloads\\%" ESCAPE '\')

title: DNS Tunnel Technique from MuddyWater - 73DD5CF1
description: Detecting DNS tunnel activity for Muddywater actor
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Image LIKE "%\\powershell.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (ParentImage LIKE "%\\excel.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "%DataExchange.dll%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Cmd.exe CommandLine Path Traversal - 4F135165
description: detects the usage of path traversal in cmd.exe indicating possible command/argument confusion/hijacking
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ParentCommandLine LIKE "%cmd%/c%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%/../../%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Firewall Disabled via Netsh - 2A315872
description: Detects netsh commands that turns off the Windows firewall
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "netsh firewall set opmode mode=disable" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "netsh advfirewall set % state off" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious Double Extension - E931DEF5
description: Detects suspicious use of an .exe extension after a non-executable file extension like .pdf.exe, a set of spaces or underlines to cloak the executable file in spear phishing campaigns
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Image LIKE "%.doc.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%.docx.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%.xls.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%.xlsx.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%.ppt.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%.pptx.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%.rtf.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%.pdf.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%.txt.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%      .exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\_\_\_\_\_\_.exe" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Domain Trust Discovery - AAF07BAC
description: Identifies execution of nltest.exe and dsquery.exe for domain trust discovery. This technique is used by attackers to enumerate Active Directory trusts.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((Image LIKE "%\\nltest.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE "%domain\_trusts%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%all\_trusts%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%/dclist%" ESCAPE '\')) OR (Image LIKE "%\\dsquery.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%trustedDomain%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Highly Relevant Renamed Binary - 48B19DED
description: Detects the execution of a renamed binary often used by attackers or malware leveraging new Sysmon OriginalFileName datapoint.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (OriginalFileName LIKE "powershell.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFileName LIKE "powershell\_ise.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFileName LIKE "psexec.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFileName LIKE "psexec.c" ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFileName LIKE "cscript.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFileName LIKE "wscript.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFileName LIKE "mshta.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFileName LIKE "regsvr32.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFileName LIKE "wmic.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFileName LIKE "certutil.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFileName LIKE "rundll32.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFileName LIKE "cmstp.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR OriginalFileName LIKE "msiexec.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%\\powershell.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\powershell\_ise.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\psexec.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\psexec64.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\cscript.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\wscript.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\mshta.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\regsvr32.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\wmic.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\certutil.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\cmstp.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\msiexec.exe" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Renamed SysInternals Debug View - B106E93A
description: Detects suspicious renamed SysInternals DebugView execution
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Product IN ("Sysinternals DebugView", "Sysinternals Debugview") AND NOT (OriginalFilename = "Dbgview.exe" AND Image LIKE "%\\Dbgview.exe" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Query Registry - E4FF1AB3
description: Adversaries may interact with the Windows Registry to gather information about the system, configuration, and installed software.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\reg.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE "%query%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%save%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%export%" ESCAPE '\') AND (CommandLine LIKE "%currentVersion\\windows%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%currentVersion\\runServicesOnce%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%currentVersion\\runServices%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%winlogon\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%currentVersion\\shellServiceObjectDelayLoad%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%currentVersion\\runOnce%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%currentVersion\\runOnceEx%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%currentVersion\\run%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%currentVersion\\policies\\explorer\\run%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%currentcontrolset\\services%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: CMSTP Execution Process Creation - D7FF8608
description: Detects various indicators of Microsoft Connection Manager Profile Installer execution
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ParentImage LIKE "%\\cmstp.exe" ESCAPE '\')

title: Application Whitelisting Bypass via DLL Loaded by odbcconf.exe - 7018583C
description: Detects defence evasion attempt via odbcconf.exe execution to load DLL
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((Image LIKE "%\\odbcconf.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE "%-f%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%regsvr%" ESCAPE '\')) OR (ParentImage LIKE "%\\odbcconf.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Indirect Command Execution - 5029FF8F
description: Detect indirect command execution via Program Compatibility Assistant pcalua.exe or forfiles.exe
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (ParentImage LIKE "%\\pcalua.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE "%\\forfiles.exe" ESCAPE '\'))

title: UNC2452 Process Creation Patterns - E33DF2A1
description: Detects a specific process creation patterns as seen used by UNC2452 and provided by Microsoft as Microsoft Defender ATP queries
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (((((CommandLine LIKE "%7z.exe a -v500m -mx9 -r0 -p%" ESCAPE '\') OR (ParentCommandLine LIKE "%wscript.exe%" ESCAPE '\' AND ParentCommandLine LIKE "%.vbs%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%rundll32.exe%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%C:\\Windows%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%.dll,Tk\_%" ESCAPE '\')) OR (ParentImage LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND ParentCommandLine LIKE "%C:\\Windows%" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%cmd.exe /C %" ESCAPE '\')) OR (CommandLine LIKE "%rundll32 c:\\windows\\\*" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%.dll %" ESCAPE '\')) OR (EventID = "1" AND (ParentImage LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE "%\\dllhost.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (CommandLine IN (" ", "")))))

title: Remote PowerShell Session - 2B86E4D6
description: Detects remote PowerShell sections by monitoring for wsmprovhost as a parent or child process (sign of an active ps remote session)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Image LIKE "%\\wsmprovhost.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ParentImage LIKE "%\\wsmprovhost.exe" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Detection of PowerShell Execution via DLL - 9608D5B9
description: Detects PowerShell Strings applied to rundll as seen in PowerShdll.dll
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ((Image LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe" ESCAPE '\') OR (Description LIKE "%Windows-Hostprozess (Rundll32)%" ESCAPE '\')) AND (CommandLine LIKE "%Default.GetString%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%FromBase64String%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Devtoolslauncher.exe Executes Specified Binary - E6A7650F
description: The Devtoolslauncher.exe executes other binary
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\devtoolslauncher.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%LaunchForDeploy%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Netsh RDP Port Forwarding - 0BEF1061
description: Detects netsh commands that configure a port forwarding of port 3389 used for RDP
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "netsh i% p%=3389 c%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Exploited CVE-2020-10189 Zoho ManageEngine - E52723AC
description: Detects the exploitation of Zoho ManageEngine Desktop Central Java Deserialization vulnerability reported as CVE-2020-10189
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ParentImage LIKE "%DesktopCentral\_Server\\jre\\bin\\java.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND (Image LIKE "%\\cmd.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\powershell.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\bitsadmin.exe" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious RASdial Activity - 72AFC849
description: Detects suspicious process related to rasdial.exe
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (Image LIKE "%rasdial.exe" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious Rundll32 Activity - DF5D62E3
description: Detects suspicious process related to rundll32 based on arguments
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND (CommandLine LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe% url.dll,%OpenURL %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe% url.dll,%OpenURLA %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe% url.dll,%FileProtocolHandler %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe% zipfldr.dll,%RouteTheCall %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe% Shell32.dll,%Control\_RunDLL %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe javascript:%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% url.dll,%OpenURL %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% url.dll,%OpenURLA %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% url.dll,%FileProtocolHandler %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% zipfldr.dll,%RouteTheCall %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% Shell32.dll,%Control\_RunDLL %" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "% javascript:%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%.RegisterXLL%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious Driver Load from Temp - E5AE3A7A
description: Detects a driver load from a temporary directory
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "6" AND ImageLoaded LIKE "%\\Temp\\%" ESCAPE '\')

title: PowerShell Rundll32 Remote Thread Creation - 2F849328
description: Detects PowerShell remote thread creation in Rundll32.exe
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "8" AND SourceImage LIKE "%\\powershell.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND TargetImage LIKE "%\\rundll32.exe" ESCAPE '\')

title: Alternate PowerShell Hosts Pipe - F2C57707
description: Detects alternate PowerShell hosts potentially bypassing detections looking for powershell.exe
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = "17" AND PipeName LIKE "\\PSHost%" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%\\powershell.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\powershell\_ise.exe" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Suspicious Scripting in a WMI Consumer - 7A786149
description: Detects suspicious scripting in WMI Event Consumers
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "20" AND (Destination LIKE "%new-object system.net.webclient).downloadstring(%" ESCAPE '\' OR Destination LIKE "%new-object system.net.webclient).downloadfile(%" ESCAPE '\' OR Destination LIKE "%new-object net.webclient).downloadstring(%" ESCAPE '\' OR Destination LIKE "%new-object net.webclient).downloadfile(%" ESCAPE '\' OR Destination LIKE "% iex(%" ESCAPE '\' OR Destination LIKE "%WScript.shell%" ESCAPE '\' OR Destination LIKE "% -nop %" ESCAPE '\' OR Destination LIKE "% -noprofile %" ESCAPE '\' OR Destination LIKE "% -decode %" ESCAPE '\' OR Destination LIKE "% -enc %" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Possible DNS Rebinding - 97CEA82E
description: Detects several different DNS-answers by one domain with IPs from internal and external networks. Normally, DNS-answer contain TTL >100. (DNS-record will saved in host cache for a while TTL).
rule: SELECT * FROM (SELECT count(QueryName) AS agg FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "22" AND QueryName LIKE "%" ESCAPE '\' AND QueryStatus = "0" AND (QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_10.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_192.168.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.16.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.17.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.18.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.19.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.20.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.21.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.22.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.23.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.24.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.25.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.26.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.27.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.28.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.29.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.30.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.31.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_127.%" ESCAPE '\') AND (EventID = "22" AND QueryName LIKE "%" ESCAPE '\' AND QueryStatus = "0") AND NOT ((QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_10.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_192.168.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.16.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.17.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.18.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.19.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.20.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.21.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.22.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.23.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.24.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.25.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.26.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.27.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.28.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.29.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.30.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_172.31.%" ESCAPE '\' OR QueryResults LIKE "(::ffff:)_127.%" ESCAPE '\'))) GROUP BY ComputerName) WHERE agg > 3

title: CobaltStrike Process Injection - 566FD168
description: Detects a possible remote threat creation with certain characteristics which are typical for Cobalt Strike beacons
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "8" AND (TargetProcessAddress LIKE "%0B80" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetProcessAddress LIKE "%0C7C" ESCAPE '\' OR TargetProcessAddress LIKE "%0C88" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Password Dumper Remote Thread in LSASS - 98CAC053
description: Detects password dumper activity by monitoring remote thread creation EventID 8 in combination with the lsass.exe process as TargetImage. The process in field Process is the malicious program. A single execution can lead to hundreds of events.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "8" AND TargetImage LIKE "C:\\Windows\\System32\\lsass.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND StartModule = "")

title: Cred Dump-Tools Named Pipes - 5C27E558
description: Detects well-known credential dumping tools execution via specific named pipes
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "17" AND (PipeName LIKE "%\\lsadump%" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "%\\cachedump%" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "%\\wceservicepipe%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Raw Disk Access Using Illegitimate Tools - 1F33C710
description: Raw disk access using illegitimate tools, possible defence evasion
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = "9" AND NOT (Device LIKE "%floppy%" ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%\\wmiprvse.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\sdiagnhost.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\searchindexer.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\csrss.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\defrag.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\smss.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\vssvc.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\compattelrunner.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\wininit.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\autochk.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\taskhost.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\dfsrs.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\vds.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\lsass.exe" ESCAPE '\')))

title: WMI Event Subscription - 76D7312E
description: Detects creation of WMI event subscription persistence method
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID IN ("19", "20", "21")

title: Malicious Named Pipe - 833DE223
description: Detects the creation of a named pipe used by known APT malware
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("17", "18") AND (PipeName LIKE "\\isapi\_http" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "\\isapi\_dg" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "\\isapi\_dg2" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "\\sdlrpc" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "\\ahexec" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "\\winsession" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "\\lsassw" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "\\46a676ab7f179e511e30dd2dc41bd388" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "\\9f81f59bc58452127884ce513865ed20" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "\\e710f28d59aa529d6792ca6ff0ca1b34" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "\\rpchlp\_3" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "\\NamePipe\_MoreWindows" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "\\pcheap\_reuse" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "\\msagent\_%" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "\\gruntsvc" ESCAPE '\'))

title: CreateRemoteThread API and LoadLibrary - DA07CE53
description: Detects potential use of CreateRemoteThread api and LoadLibrary function to inject DLL into a process
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "8" AND StartModule LIKE "%\\kernel32.dll" ESCAPE '\' AND StartFunction = "LoadLibraryA")

title: Suspicious Remote Thread Created - 5C4FD135
description: Offensive tradecraft is switching away from using APIs like "CreateRemoteThread", however, this is still largely observed in the wild. This rule aims to detect suspicious processes (those we would not expect to behave in this way like word.exe or outlook.exe) creating remote threads on other processes. It is a generalistic rule, but it should have a low FP ratio due to the selected range of processes.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = "8" AND (SourceImage LIKE "%\\bash.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\cvtres.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\defrag.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\dnx.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\esentutl.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\excel.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\expand.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\explorer.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\find.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\findstr.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\forfiles.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\git.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\gpupdate.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\hh.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\iexplore.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\installutil.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\lync.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\makecab.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\mDNSResponder.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\monitoringhost.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\msbuild.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\mshta.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\msiexec.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\mspaint.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\outlook.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\ping.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\powerpnt.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\powershell.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\provtool.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\python.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\regsvr32.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\robocopy.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\runonce.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\sapcimc.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\schtasks.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\smartscreen.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\spoolsv.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\tstheme.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\userinit.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\vssadmin.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\vssvc.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\w3wp.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\winlogon.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\winscp.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\wmic.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\word.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR SourceImage LIKE "%\\wscript.exe" ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT (SourceImage LIKE "%Visual Studio%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Turla Group Named Pipes - CE454F64
description: Detects a named pipe used by Turla group samples
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("17", "18") AND (PipeName LIKE "\\atctl" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "\\userpipe" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "\\iehelper" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "\\sdlrpc" ESCAPE '\' OR PipeName LIKE "\\comnap" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Relevant Anti-Virus Event - 3797B729
description: This detection method points out highly relevant Antivirus events
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((Message LIKE "%HTool%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Hacktool%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%ASP/Backdoor%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%JSP/Backdoor%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%PHP/Backdoor%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Backdoor.ASP%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Backdoor.JSP%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Backdoor.PHP%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Webshell%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Portscan%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Mimikatz%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%WinCred%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%PlugX%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Korplug%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Pwdump%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Chopper%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%WmiExec%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Xscan%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Clearlog%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%ASPXSpy%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Seatbelt%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%sbelt%" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT ((Message LIKE "%Keygen%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Crack%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Reconnaissance Activity - 3CDBE22E
description: Detects activity as "net user administrator /domain" and "net group domain admins /domain"
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4661" AND AccessMask = "0x2d" AND ((ObjectType LIKE "SAM\_USER" ESCAPE '\' AND ObjectName LIKE "S-1-5-21-%-500" ESCAPE '\') OR (ObjectType LIKE "SAM\_GROUP" ESCAPE '\' AND ObjectName LIKE "S-1-5-21-%-512" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Denied Access To Remote Desktop - 7BD46D56
description: This event is generated when an authenticated user who is not allowed to log on remotely attempts to connect to this computer through Remote Desktop. Often, this event can be generated by attackers when searching for available windows servers in the network.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID = "4825"

title: Suspicious Kerberos RC4 Ticket Encryption - FDE6752E
description: Detects service ticket requests using RC4 encryption type
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = "4769" AND TicketOptions = "0x40810000" AND TicketEncryptionType = "0x17") AND NOT (ServiceName LIKE "$%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: SAM Dump to AppData - 85F96E3A
description: Detects suspicious SAM dump activity as cause by QuarksPwDump and other password dumpers
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "16" AND (Message LIKE "%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\SAM-%.dmp %" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Unauthorized System Time Modification - DCBD3378
description: Detect scenarios where a potentially unauthorized application or user is modifying the system time.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4616" AND NOT (((ProcessName LIKE "C:\\Program Files\\VMware\\VMware Tools\\vmtoolsd.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "C:\\Windows\\System32\\VBoxService.exe" ESCAPE '\') OR (ProcessName LIKE "C:\\Windows\\System32\\svchost.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND SubjectUserSid = "S-1-5-19"))))

title: External Disk Drive or USB Storage Device - 9A433141
description: Detects external diskdrives or plugged in USB devices
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (((EventID LIKE "6416" ESCAPE '\') AND DeviceClassName = "DiskDrive") OR DeviceDescription = "USB Mass Storage Device")

title: Persistence and Execution at Scale via GPO Scheduled Task - 87BBD0A3
description: Detect lateral movement using GPO scheduled task, usually used to deploy ransomware at scale
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "5145" AND ShareName LIKE "\\%\\SYSVOL" ESCAPE '\' AND RelativeTargetName LIKE "%ScheduledTasks.xml" ESCAPE '\' AND Accesses LIKE "%WriteData%" ESCAPE '\')

title: SCM Database Handle Failure - 0B6A529B
description: Detects non-system users failing to get a handle of the SCM database.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4656" AND ObjectType LIKE "SC\_MANAGER OBJECT" ESCAPE '\' AND ObjectName = "servicesactive" AND Keywords = "Audit Failure" AND SubjectLogonId = "0x3e4")

title: Turla Service Install - B8B08D4E
description: This method detects a service install of malicious services mentioned in Carbon Paper - Turla report by ESET
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7045" AND ServiceName IN ("srservice", "ipvpn", "hkmsvc"))

title: SysKey Registry Keys Access - 0E28ECC3
description: Detects handle requests and access operations to specific registry keys to calculate the SysKey
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("4656", "4663") AND ObjectType = "key" AND (ObjectName LIKE "%lsa\\JD" ESCAPE '\' OR ObjectName LIKE "%lsa\\GBG" ESCAPE '\' OR ObjectName LIKE "%lsa\\Skew1" ESCAPE '\' OR ObjectName LIKE "%lsa\\Data" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Remote PowerShell Sessions - 5F3F6748
description: Detects basic PowerShell Remoting by monitoring for network inbound connections to ports 5985 OR 5986
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "5156" AND DestPort IN ("5985", "5986") AND LayerRTID = "44")

title: New or Renamed User Account with '$' in Attribute 'SamAccountName'. - E419ECA1
description: Detects possible bypass EDR and SIEM via abnormal user account name.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("4720", "4781") AND UserName LIKE "%$%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Account Tampering - Suspicious Failed Logon Reasons - 5AE93C84
description: This method uses uncommon error codes on failed logons to determine suspicious activity and tampering with accounts that have been disabled or somehow restricted.

title: Mimikatz DC Sync - F8468E10
description: Detects Mimikatz DC sync security events
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (((EventID = "4662" AND (Properties LIKE "%Replicating Directory Changes All%" ESCAPE '\' OR Properties LIKE "%1131f6ad-9c07-11d1-f79f-00c04fc2dcd2%" ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT (SubjectDomainName = "Window Manager")) AND NOT ((SubjectUserName LIKE "NT AUTHORITY%" ESCAPE '\' OR SubjectUserName LIKE "%$" ESCAPE '\' OR SubjectUserName LIKE "MSOL\_%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: RDP Login from Localhost - CD84D735
description: RDP login with localhost source address may be a tunnelled login
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4624" AND LogonType = "10" AND SourceNetworkAddress IN ("::1", "127.0.0.1"))

title: Scheduled Task Deletion - B6D98C46
description: Detects scheduled task deletion events. Scheduled tasks are likely to be deleted if not used for persistence. Malicious Software often creates tasks directly under the root node e.g. \TASKNAME
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID = "4699"

title: Remote Service Activity via SVCCTL Named Pipe - 20C00CEA
description: Detects remote service activity via remote access to the svcctl named pipe
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "5145" AND ShareName LIKE "\\%\\IPC$" ESCAPE '\' AND RelativeTargetName = "svcctl" AND Accesses LIKE "%WriteData%" ESCAPE '\')

title: AD Privileged Users or Groups Reconnaissance - DD452ED9
description: Detect priv users or groups recon based on 4661 eventid and known privileged users or groups SIDs
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4661" AND (ObjectType LIKE "SAM\_USER" ESCAPE '\' OR ObjectType LIKE "SAM\_GROUP" ESCAPE '\') AND (ObjectName LIKE "%-512" ESCAPE '\' OR ObjectName LIKE "%-502" ESCAPE '\' OR ObjectName LIKE "%-500" ESCAPE '\' OR ObjectName LIKE "%-505" ESCAPE '\' OR ObjectName LIKE "%-519" ESCAPE '\' OR ObjectName LIKE "%-520" ESCAPE '\' OR ObjectName LIKE "%-544" ESCAPE '\' OR ObjectName LIKE "%-551" ESCAPE '\' OR ObjectName LIKE "%-555" ESCAPE '\' OR ObjectName LIKE "%admin%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: NTFS Vulnerability Exploitation - D81FA8C5
description: This the exploitation of a NTFS vulnerability as reported without many details via Twitter
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "55" AND Origin = "File System Driver" AND Description LIKE "%contains a corrupted file record%" ESCAPE '\' AND Description LIKE "%The name of the file is "\\"%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Secure Deletion with SDelete - 227C860C
description: Detects renaming of file while deletion with SDelete tool
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("4656", "4663", "4658") AND (ObjectName LIKE "%.AAA" ESCAPE '\' OR ObjectName LIKE "%.ZZZ" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Pass the Hash Activity 2 - D427EDE0
description: Detects the attack technique pass the hash which is used to move laterally inside the network
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = "4624" AND ((SubjectUserSid = "S-1-0-0" AND LogonType = "3" AND LogonProcessName = "NtLmSsp" AND KeyLength = "0") OR (LogonType = "9" AND LogonProcessName = "seclogo"))) AND NOT (AccountName = "ANONYMOUS LOGON"))

title: QuarksPwDump Clearing Access History - F0B23AA1
description: Detects QuarksPwDump clearing access history in hive
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "16" AND HiveName LIKE "%\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\SAM%" ESCAPE '\' AND HiveName LIKE "%.dmp" ESCAPE '\')

title: Meterpreter or Cobalt Strike Getsystem Service Installation - 17FDA933
description: Detects the use of getsystem Meterpreter/Cobalt Strike command by detecting a specific service installation
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7045" AND ((ServiceFileName LIKE "%cmd%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%/c%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%echo%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%\\pipe\\%" ESCAPE '\') OR (ServiceFileName LIKE "%\%COMSPEC\%%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%/c%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%echo%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%\\pipe\\%" ESCAPE '\') OR (ServiceFileName LIKE "%rundll32%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%.dll,a%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%/p:%" ESCAPE '\')))

SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "6" AND ((ServiceFileName LIKE "%cmd%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%/c%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%echo%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%\\pipe\\%" ESCAPE '\') OR (ServiceFileName LIKE "%\%COMSPEC\%%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%/c%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%echo%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%\\pipe\\%" ESCAPE '\') OR (ServiceFileName LIKE "%rundll32%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%.dll,a%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%/p:%" ESCAPE '\')))

SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4697" AND ((ServiceFileName LIKE "%cmd%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%/c%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%echo%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%\\pipe\\%" ESCAPE '\') OR (ServiceFileName LIKE "%\%COMSPEC\%%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%/c%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%echo%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%\\pipe\\%" ESCAPE '\') OR (ServiceFileName LIKE "%rundll32%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%.dll,a%" ESCAPE '\' AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%/p:%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: NTLM Logon - 74C89C38
description: Detects logons using NTLM, which could be caused by a legacy source or attackers
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "8002" AND CallingProcessName LIKE "%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Admin User Remote Logon - 4A40A753
description: Detect remote login by Administrator user depending on internal pattern
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4624" AND LogonType = "10" AND AuthenticationPackageName = "Negotiate" AND AccountName LIKE "Admin-%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Vulnerable Netlogon Secure Channel Connection Allowed - 77BA5A83
description: Detects that a vulnerable Netlogon secure channel connection was allowed, which could be an indicator of CVE-2020-1472.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID LIKE "5829" ESCAPE '\')

title: Addition of Domain Trusts - 785FB1C6
description: Addition of domains is seldom and should be verified for legitimacy.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID = "4706"

title: COMPlus_ETWEnabled Registry Modification - A9F42D97
description: Potential adversaries stopping ETW providers recording loaded .NET assemblies.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4657" AND ObjectName LIKE "%\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\.NETFramework" ESCAPE '\' AND ObjectValueName = "ETWEnabled" AND NewValue = "0")

title: Local User Creation - EC51C58E
description: Detects local user creation on windows servers, which shouldn't happen in an Active Directory environment. Apply this Sigma Use Case on your windows server logs and not on your DC logs.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID = "4720"

title: Transferring Files with Credential Data via Network Shares - 2E79E1AF
description: Transferring files with well-known filenames (sensitive files with credential data) using network shares
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "5145" AND (RelativeTargetName LIKE "%\\mimidrv%" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%\\lsass%" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%\\windows\\minidump\\%" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%\\hiberfil%" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%\\sqldmpr%" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%\\sam%" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%\\ntds.dit%" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%\\security%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Rare Schtasks Creations - 8BDB4529
description: Detects rare scheduled tasks creations that only appear a few times per time frame and could reveal password dumpers, backdoor installs or other types of malicious code
rule: SELECT * FROM (SELECT count(*) AS agg FROM logs WHERE EventID = "4698" GROUP BY TaskName) WHERE agg < 5

title: Successful Overpass the Hash Attempt - 6C674B37
description: Detects successful logon with logon type 9 (NewCredentials) which matches the Overpass the Hash behavior of e.g Mimikatz's sekurlsa::pth module.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4624" AND LogonType = "9" AND LogonProcessName = "seclogo" AND AuthenticationPackageName = "Negotiate")

title: SCM Database Privileged Operation - D4E6315A
description: Detects non-system users performing privileged operation os the SCM database
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4674" AND ObjectType LIKE "SC\_MANAGER OBJECT" ESCAPE '\' AND ObjectName = "servicesactive" AND PrivilegeList = "SeTakeOwnershipPrivilege" AND SubjectLogonId = "0x3e4")

title: Security Eventlog Cleared - 115D8E42
description: Some threat groups tend to delete the local 'Security' Eventlog using certain utitlities
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID IN ("517", "1102")

title: StoneDrill Service Install - A5039433
description: This method detects a service install of the malicious Microsoft Network Realtime Inspection Service service described in StoneDrill report by Kaspersky
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7045" AND ServiceName = "NtsSrv" AND ServiceFileName LIKE "% LocalService" ESCAPE '\')

title: Suspicious Driver Loaded By User - 728D4C1D
description: Detects the loading of drivers via 'SeLoadDriverPrivilege' required to load or unload a device driver. With this privilege, the user can dynamically load and unload device drivers or other code in to kernel mode. This user right does not apply to Plug and Play device drivers. If you exclude privileged users/admins and processes, which are allowed to do so, you are maybe left with bad programs trying to load malicious kernel drivers. This will detect Ghost-In-The-Logs (https://github.com/bats3c/Ghost-In-The-Logs) and the usage of Sysinternals and various other tools. So you have to work with a whitelist to find the bad stuff.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = "4673" AND PrivilegeList = "SeLoadDriverPrivilege" AND Service = "-") AND NOT ((ProcessName LIKE "%\\Windows\\System32\\Dism.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\Windows\\System32\\rundll32.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\Windows\\System32\\fltMC.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\Windows\\HelpPane.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\Windows\\System32\\mmc.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\Windows\\System32\\svchost.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\Windows\\System32\\wimserv.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\procexp64.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\procexp.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\procmon64.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\procmon.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\chrome.exe%" ESCAPE '\')))

title: Suspicious LDAP-Attributes Used - 06ABBFB0
description: Detects the usage of particular AttributeLDAPDisplayNames, which are known for data exchange via LDAP by the tool LDAPFragger and are additionally not commonly used in companies.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "5136" AND AttributeValue LIKE "%" ESCAPE '\' AND AttributeLDAPDisplayName IN ("primaryInternationalISDNNumber", "otherFacsimileTelephoneNumber", "primaryTelexNumber"))

title: Eventlog Cleared - 0A7C602D
description: One of the Windows Eventlogs has been cleared. e.g. caused by "wevtutil cl" command execution
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((service = "security" AND EventID IN ("517", "1102")) OR (service = "system" AND EventID = "104" AND Source = "Microsoft-Windows-Eventlog"))

title: Powerview Add-DomainObjectAcl DCSync AD Extend Right - 41DB6407
description: backdooring domain object to grant the rights associated with DCSync to a regular user or machine account using Powerview\Add-DomainObjectAcl DCSync Extended Right cmdlet, will allow to re-obtain the pwd hashes of any user/computer
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "5136" AND LDAPDisplayName = "ntSecurityDescriptor" AND (Value LIKE "%1131f6ad-9c07-11d1-f79f-00c04fc2dcd2%" ESCAPE '\' OR Value LIKE "%1131f6aa-9c07-11d1-f79f-00c04fc2dcd2%" ESCAPE '\' OR Value LIKE "%89e95b76-444d-4c62-991a-0facbeda640c%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Suspicious Windows ANONYMOUS LOGON Local Account Created - EEF41B8B
description: Detects the creation of suspicious accounts similar to ANONYMOUS LOGON, such as using additional spaces. Created as an covering detection for exclusion of Logon Type 3 from ANONYMOUS LOGON accounts.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4720" AND SAMAccountName LIKE "%ANONYMOUS%LOGON%" ESCAPE '\')

title: DHCP Server Loaded the CallOut DLL - FC4A3FB3
description: This rule detects a DHCP server in which a specified Callout DLL (in registry) was loaded
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1033" AND Source = "Microsoft-Windows-DHCP-Server")

title: SAM Registry Hive Handle Request - DA0447A0
description: Detects handles requested to SAM registry hive
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4656" AND ObjectType = "Key" AND ObjectName LIKE "%\\SAM" ESCAPE '\')

title: MSHTA Suspicious Execution 01 - 91FF0488
description: Detection for mshta.exe suspicious execution patterns sometimes involving file polyglotism
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND Image LIKE "%\\mshta.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND (CommandLine LIKE "%vbscript%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%.jpg%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%.png%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%.lnk%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%.xls%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%.doc%" ESCAPE '\' OR CommandLine LIKE "%.zip%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Register new Logon Process by Rubeus - 0FCA9B51
description: Detects potential use of Rubeus via registered new trusted logon process
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4611" AND LogonProcessName = "User32LogonProcesss")

title: Potential RDP Exploit CVE-2019-0708 - 5CB95C49
description: Detect suspicious error on protocol RDP, potential CVE-2019-0708
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("56", "50") AND Source = "TermDD")

title: Suspicious Outbound Kerberos Connection - 09A2043A
description: Detects suspicious outbound network activity via kerberos default port indicating possible lateral movement or first stage PrivEsc via delegation.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = "5156" AND DestinationPort = "88") AND NOT ((Image LIKE "%\\lsass.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\opera.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\chrome.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR Image LIKE "%\\firefox.exe" ESCAPE '\')))

title: smbexec.py Service Installation - 909C091B
description: Detects the use of smbexec.py tool by detecting a specific service installation
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7045" AND ServiceName = "BTOBTO" AND ServiceFileName LIKE "%\\execute.bat" ESCAPE '\')

title: DPAPI Domain Master Key Backup Attempt - A5C0F96F
description: Detects anyone attempting a backup for the DPAPI Master Key. This events gets generated at the source and not the Domain Controller.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID = "4692"

title: DNS Server Error Failed Loading the ServerLevelPluginDLL - E132A88E
description: This rule detects a DNS server error in which a specified plugin DLL (in registry) could not be loaded
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID IN ("150", "770")

title: Malicious Service Installations - 7D32A904
description: Detects known malicious service installs that only appear in cases of lateral movement, credential dumping and other suspicious activity
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7045" AND (ServiceFileName LIKE "%\\PAExec%" ESCAPE '\' OR ServiceName = "mssecsvc2.0" OR ServiceFileName LIKE "%net user%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Hacktool Ruler - 2AABC1F9
description: This events that are generated when using the hacktool Ruler by Sensepost
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (((EventID LIKE "4776" ESCAPE '\') AND Workstation = "RULER") OR (EventID IN ("4624", "4625") AND WorkstationName = "RULER"))

title: MMC20 Lateral Movement - DB229A57
description: Detects MMC20.Application Lateral Movement; specifically looks for the spawning of the parent MMC.exe with a command line of "-Embedding" as a child of svchost.exe
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "1" AND ParentImage LIKE "%\\svchost.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND Image LIKE "%\\mmc.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND CommandLine LIKE "%-Embedding%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Remote Registry Management Using Reg Utility - 0BF68408
description: Remote registry management using REG utility from non-admin workstation
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = "5145" AND RelativeTargetName LIKE "%\\winreg%" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (IpAddress LIKE "\%Admins\_Workstations\%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: AD Object WriteDAC Access - 238EC995
description: Detects WRITE_DAC access to a domain object
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4662" AND ObjectServer = "DS" AND AccessMask = "0x40000" AND ObjectType IN ("19195a5b-6da0-11d0-afd3-00c04fd930c9", "domainDNS"))

title: Mimikatz Use - 269CC40D
description: This method detects mimikatz keywords in different Eventlogs (some of them only appear in older Mimikatz version that are however still used by different threat groups)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (Message LIKE "% mimikatz %" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "% mimilib %" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "% <3 eo.oe %" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "% eo.oe.kiwi %" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "% privilege::debug %" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "% sekurlsa::logonpasswords %" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "% lsadump::sam %" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "% mimidrv.sys %" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "% p::d %" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "% s::l %" ESCAPE '\')

title: Suspicious Access to Sensitive File Extensions - 05B63409
description: Detects known sensitive file extensions accessed on a network share
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID LIKE "5145" ESCAPE '\') AND (RelativeTargetName LIKE "%.pst" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%.ost" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%.msg" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%.nst" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%.oab" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%.edb" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%.nsf" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%.bak" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%.dmp" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%.kirbi" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%\\groups.xml" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%.rdp" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Enabled User Right in AD to Control User Objects - 56090BCB
description: Detects scenario where if a user is assigned the SeEnableDelegationPrivilege right in Active Directory it would allow control of other AD user objects.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4704" AND (Message LIKE "%SeEnableDelegationPrivilege%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: DHCP Server Error Failed Loading the CallOut DLL - 670F3022
description: This rule detects a DHCP server error in which a specified Callout DLL (in registry) could not be loaded
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("1031", "1032", "1034") AND Source = "Microsoft-Windows-DHCP-Server")

title: Disabling Windows Event Auditing - 81C3B226
description: Detects scenarios where system auditing (ie: windows event log auditing) is disabled. This may be used in a scenario where an entity would want to bypass local logging to evade detection when windows event logging is enabled and reviewed. Also, it is recommended to turn off "Local Group Policy Object Processing" via GPO, which will make sure that Active Directory GPOs take precedence over local/edited computer policies via something such as "gpedit.msc". Please note, that disabling "Local Group Policy Object Processing" may cause an issue in scenarios of one off specific GPO modifications -- however it is recommended to perform these modifications in Active Directory anyways.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4719" AND (AuditPolicyChanges LIKE "%\%\%8448%" ESCAPE '\' OR AuditPolicyChanges LIKE "%\%\%8450%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Rare Service Installs - FFF59444
description: Detects rare service installs that only appear a few times per time frame and could reveal password dumpers, backdoor installs or other types of malicious services
rule: SELECT * FROM (SELECT count(*) AS agg FROM logs WHERE EventID = "7045" GROUP BY ServiceFileName) WHERE agg < 5

title: Interactive Logon to Server Systems - 13C79E5F
description: Detects interactive console logons to Server Systems
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID IN ("528", "529", "4624", "4625") AND LogonType = "2" AND (ComputerName LIKE "\%ServerSystems\%" ESCAPE '\' OR ComputerName LIKE "\%DomainControllers\%" ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT (LogonProcessName = "Advapi" AND ComputerName LIKE "\%Workstations\%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Password Change on Directory Service Restore Mode (DSRM) Account - B18E3CB8
description: The Directory Service Restore Mode (DSRM) account is a local administrator account on Domain Controllers. Attackers may change the password to gain persistence.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID = "4794"

title: NetNTLM Downgrade Attack - 6F0E429C
description: Detects NetNTLM downgrade attack

title: Protected Storage Service Access - 4FA29D4A
description: Detects access to a protected_storage service over the network. Potential abuse of DPAPI to extract domain backup keys from Domain Controllers
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "5145" AND ShareName LIKE "%IPC%" ESCAPE '\' AND RelativeTargetName LIKE "protected\_storage" ESCAPE '\')

title: Microsoft Malware Protection Engine Crash - 6C9C4399
description: This rule detects a suspicious crash of the Microsoft Malware Protection Engine
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (((Source = "Application Error" AND EventID = "1000") OR (Source = "Windows Error Reporting" AND EventID = "1001")) AND (Message LIKE "%MsMpEng.exe%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%mpengine.dll%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: WCE wceaux.dll Access - 9BE811E4
description: Detects wceaux.dll access while WCE pass-the-hash remote command execution on source host
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID IN ("4656", "4658", "4660", "4663") AND ObjectName LIKE "%\\wceaux.dll" ESCAPE '\')

title: Suspicious PsExec Execution - 60E0ECAF
description: detects execution of psexec or paexec with renamed service name, this rule helps to filter out the noise if psexec is used for legit purposes or if attacker uses a different psexec client other than sysinternal one
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = "5145" AND ShareName LIKE "\\%\\IPC$" ESCAPE '\' AND (RelativeTargetName LIKE "%-stdin" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%-stdout" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%-stderr" ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT (EventID = "5145" AND ShareName LIKE "\\%\\IPC$" ESCAPE '\' AND RelativeTargetName LIKE "PSEXESVC%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Backup Catalog Deleted - 9B240199
description: Detects backup catalog deletions
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "524" AND Source = "Microsoft-Windows-Backup")

title: Potential Remote Desktop Connection to Non-Domain Host - F81B04DD
description: Detects logons using NTLM to hosts that are potentially not part of the domain.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "8001" AND TargetName LIKE "TERMSRV%" ESCAPE '\')

title: Audit CVE Event - 733EEE41
description: Detects events generated by Windows to indicate the exploitation of a known vulnerability (e.g. CVE-2020-0601)
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE Source = "Microsoft-Windows-Audit-CVE"

title: Kerberos Manipulation - 2C50DA4D
description: This method triggers on rare Kerberos Failure Codes caused by manipulations of Kerberos messages

title: Weak Encryption Enabled and Kerberoast - A5E4116C
description: Detects scenario where weak encryption is enabled for a user profile which could be used for hash/password cracking.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4738" AND (Message LIKE "%DES%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Preauth%" ESCAPE '\' OR Message LIKE "%Encrypted%" ESCAPE '\') AND (Message LIKE "%Enabled%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Tap Driver Installation - 83C8B118
description: Well-known TAP software installation. Possible preparation for data exfiltration using tunnelling techniques
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7045" AND ImagePath LIKE "%tap0901%" ESCAPE '\')
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "6" AND ImagePath LIKE "%tap0901%" ESCAPE '\')
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4697" AND ImagePath LIKE "%tap0901%" ESCAPE '\')

description: Detects enumeration of the global catalog (that can be performed using BloodHound or others AD reconnaissance tools). Adjust Threshold according to domain width.
title: Enumeration via the Global Catalog - A4667EEE
rule: SELECT * FROM (SELECT count(*) AS agg FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "5156" AND DestinationPort IN ("3268", "3269")) GROUP BY SourceAddress) WHERE agg > 2000

title: DPAPI Domain Backup Key Extraction - 1F38E4F2
description: Detects tools extracting LSA secret DPAPI domain backup key from Domain Controllers
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4662" AND ObjectType = "SecretObject" AND AccessMask = "0x2" AND ObjectName = "BCKUPKEY")

title: RottenPotato Like Attack Pattern - 0BA514E1
description: Detects logon events that have characteristics of events generated during an attack with RottenPotato and the like
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4624" AND LogonType = "3" AND TargetUserName LIKE "ANONYMOUS\_LOGON" ESCAPE '\' AND WorkstationName = "-" AND SourceNetworkAddress = "127.0.0.1")

title: Impacket PsExec Execution - D8619FDA
description: Detects execution of Impacket's psexec.py.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "5145" AND ShareName LIKE "\\%\\IPC$" ESCAPE '\' AND (RelativeTargetName LIKE "%RemCom\_stdint%" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%RemCom\_stdoutt%" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "%RemCom\_stderrt%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: First Time Seen Remote Named Pipe - 0AE5A137
description: This detection excludes known namped pipes accessible remotely and notify on newly observed ones, may help to detect lateral movement and remote exec using named pipes
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = "5145" AND ShareName LIKE "\\%\\IPC$" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (EventID = "5145" AND ShareName LIKE "\\%\\IPC$" ESCAPE '\' AND (RelativeTargetName LIKE "atsvc" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "samr" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "lsarpc" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "winreg" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "netlogon" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "srvsvc" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "protected\_storage" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "wkssvc" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "browser" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "netdfs" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "svcctl" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "spoolss" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "ntsvcs" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "LSM\_API\_service" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "HydraLsPipe" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "TermSrv\_API\_service" ESCAPE '\' OR RelativeTargetName LIKE "MsFteWds" ESCAPE '\')))

title: File Was Not Allowed To Run - D4EE8F81
description: Detect run not allowed files. Applocker is a very useful tool, especially on servers where unprivileged users have access. For example terminal servers. You need configure applocker and log collect to receive these events.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID IN ("8004", "8007")

title: Login with WMI - F9ACDCFE
description: Detection of logins performed with WMI
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "4624" AND ProcessName LIKE "%\\WmiPrvSE.exe" ESCAPE '\')

title: USB Device Plugged - A76AD0FD
description: Detects plugged USB devices
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID IN ("2003", "2100", "2102")

title: Failed Code Integrity Checks - F6AC19DF
description: Code integrity failures may indicate tampered executables.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE EventID IN ("5038", "6281")

title: LSASS Access from Non System Account - 010F1113
description: Detects potential mimikatz-like tools accessing LSASS from non system account
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID IN ("4663", "4656") AND AccessMask IN ("0x40", "0x1400", "0x1000", "0x100000", "0x1410", "0x1010", "0x1438", "0x143a", "0x1418", "0x1f0fff", "0x1f1fff", "0x1f2fff", "0x1f3fff", "40", "1400", "1000", "100000", "1410", "1010", "1438", "143a", "1418", "1f0fff", "1f1fff", "1f2fff", "1f3fff") AND ObjectType = "Process" AND ObjectName LIKE "%\\lsass.exe" ESCAPE '\') AND NOT (SubjectUserName LIKE "%$" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Possible Impacket SecretDump Remote Activity - B6C00840
description: Detect AD credential dumping using impacket secretdump HKTL
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "5145" AND ShareName LIKE "\\%\\ADMIN$" ESCAPE '\' AND RelativeTargetName LIKE "SYSTEM32\\%.tmp" ESCAPE '\')

title: Turla PNG Dropper Service - 727CB70A
description: This method detects malicious services mentioned in Turla PNG dropper report by NCC Group in November 2018
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE (EventID = "7045" AND ServiceName = "WerFaultSvc")

title: Pass the Hash Activity - F2EE3896
description: Detects the attack technique pass the hash which is used to move laterally inside the network
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((LogonType = "3" AND LogonProcessName = "NtLmSsp" AND WorkstationName LIKE "\%Workstations\%" ESCAPE '\' AND ComputerName LIKE "\%Workstations\%" ESCAPE '\' AND (EventID = "4624" OR EventID = "4625")) AND NOT (AccountName = "ANONYMOUS LOGON"))

title: Active Directory Replication from Non Machine Account - 3130AB86
description: Detects potential abuse of Active Directory Replication Service (ADRS) from a non machine account to request credentials.
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = "4662" AND AccessMask = "0x100" AND (Properties LIKE "%1131f6aa-9c07-11d1-f79f-00c04fc2dcd2%" ESCAPE '\' OR Properties LIKE "%1131f6ad-9c07-11d1-f79f-00c04fc2dcd2%" ESCAPE '\' OR Properties LIKE "%89e95b76-444d-4c62-991a-0facbeda640c%" ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT (SubjectUserName LIKE "%$" ESCAPE '\' OR SubjectUserName LIKE "MSOL\_%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Access to ADMIN$ Share - 3FB84A7C
description: Detects access to $ADMIN share
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = "5140" AND ShareName = "Admin$") AND NOT (SubjectUserName LIKE "%$" ESCAPE '\'))

title: User Added to Local Administrators - 5B23AA4B
description: This rule triggers on user accounts that are added to the local Administrators group, which could be legitimate activity or a sign of privilege escalation activity
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = "4732" AND (GroupName = "Administrators" OR GroupSid = "S-1-5-32-544")) AND NOT (SubjectUserName LIKE "%$" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Possible DC Shadow - 54CA1F49
description: Detects DCShadow via create new SPN
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = "4742" AND ServicePrincipalNames LIKE "%GC/%" ESCAPE '\') OR (EventID = "5136" AND LDAPDisplayName = "servicePrincipalName" AND Value LIKE "GC/%" ESCAPE '\'))

title: Generic Password Dumper Activity on LSASS - FA2DCF85
description: Detects process handle on LSASS process with certain access mask
rule: SELECT * FROM logs WHERE ((EventID = "4656" AND ObjectName LIKE "%\\lsass.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND (AccessMask LIKE "%0x40%" ESCAPE '\' OR AccessMask LIKE "%0x1400%" ESCAPE '\' OR AccessMask LIKE "%0x1000%" ESCAPE '\' OR AccessMask LIKE "%0x100000%" ESCAPE '\' OR AccessMask LIKE "%0x1410%" ESCAPE '\' OR AccessMask LIKE "%0x1010%" ESCAPE '\' OR AccessMask LIKE "%0x1438%" ESCAPE '\' OR AccessMask LIKE "%0x143a%" ESCAPE '\' OR AccessMask LIKE "%0x1418%" ESCAPE '\' OR AccessMask LIKE "%0x1f0fff%" ESCAPE '\' OR AccessMask LIKE "%0x1f1fff%" ESCAPE '\' OR AccessMask LIKE "%0x1f2fff%" ESCAPE '\' OR AccessMask LIKE "%0x1f3fff%" ESCAPE '\')) OR ((EventID = "4663" AND ObjectName LIKE "%\\lsass.exe" ESCAPE '\' AND (AccessList LIKE "%4484%" ESCAPE '\' OR AccessList LIKE "%4416%" ESCAPE '\')) AND NOT ((ProcessName LIKE "%\\wmiprvse.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\taskmgr.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\procexp64.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\procexp.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\lsm.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\csrss.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\wininit.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\vmtoolsd.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\minionhost.exe" ESCAPE '\' OR ProcessName LIKE "%\\VsTskMgr.exe" ESCAPE '\'))))

title: Failed Logon From Public IP - 977876A0
description: A login from a public IP can indicate a misconfigured firewall or network boundary.
